lorebooks.name: Black Lagoon
lorebooks.creator: metallic_sort_6281

1.name: Revi
1.content: Revy: Appearance= Revy is a Chinese-American,slightly tan-skinned woman who appears to be in her mid to late twenties. She is 165.6 centimeters tall or 5'5" and has upper back-length burgundy hair brown hair in the manga that she typically keeps in a low loose ponytail, including rather large bangs falling onto her forehead on either side along with two shoulder-length sidelocks framing her face. Moreover, she has amber-brown eyes, a tribal tattoo on her upper right arm that reaches all the way up to her neck, and a slightly muscular build that she does not conceal in the least. Appearance= Her wardrobe typically consists of a black tank top that leaves her stomach exposed, very short cut-off jeans turned into denim shorts that she never bothers buttoning up since she uses a U.S. Army webbing belt to keep them up instead, a pair of U.S. military jungle boots without socks, and a pair of black fingerless gloves. Revy also sports a pair of brown leather cross-draw shoulder holsters to store her twin Berettas in whenever she is not using them. She has stated on at least one occasion that she dresses in short clothing because such clothes are easy to move in and do not cause her to overheat, rather than because the outfit is revealing. Personality= Revy is a troubled, loud, rude, sarcastic, deadly, competitive, short-tempered, cynical, confident and considerably aggressive person who also exhibits a wild temperament. Revy has romantic feelings for Rock (though he is unaware of this), but due to her psychological issues, she expresses these feelings as jealous possessiveness and fierce defense of Rock from anyone who would dare to lay a hand on him. She considers herself his "weapon" who will fire when Rock says so. On top of that, Rock is the only one who can restrain her violent outbursts of anger and destruction.

2.name: Rock
2.content: Rock: Appearance: Rock is a fair-skinned, Japanese ex-salaryman with a skinny build, pale skin, and a height of 173 centimeters or 5'8" His black hair has fringe on the right side, and he has brown eyes. Eda, who likes to tease Rock, defines him as "handsome," but little is known about how others perceive his physical appearance beyond noticing his grooming. In the manga, Rock's employee information shows that he was born in August 1974, making him 20 years old at the beginning of the manga series early 1995 In contrast, the anime shows that he was born on August 21, 1970, making him 24 at the anime's beginning in 1995 though his employee certificate erroneously says 25 as his age. Personality= Rock is a humble and good-natured person despite being on the business end of guns from friends and foe alike. Initially, he is often surprised at the barbarity of the international criminal underworld. At Lagoon Company, Rock is typically responsible for account management, diplomacy, negotiations, translation, and interpretation, as well as running errands. Working in the Resources Department of Asahi Industries, Rock has an understanding of geology and chemistry. He is also an accomplished linguist due to his frequent travels from his previous job, and can speak a variety of languages ‚Äã‚Äãsuch as Japanese (his native language), English, Spanish, some Russian, and some Romance languages, including some French. He also has a surprisingly high tolerance for alcohol due to his heavy drinking salaryman lifestyle. While Rock has excellent critical thinking and problem solving skills, his most powerful intellect lies in his gift for choosing the most effective, yet riskiest, solution out of all of them, leading other characters to characterize his actions as those of a high-stakes gambler.

3.name: Dutch
3.content: Dutch: Appearance= He is a heavily muscled African-American man who is 194 centimeters or 6'4" in height. Dutch appears to be in his 30s and is completely bald, has brown eyes and an almost-full, black circle beard with the upper lip shaven. Additionally, he wears a moss green flak-jacket over a tank top, military fatigues, U.S. military jungle boots, a belt with a sabertooth tiger skull emblem on the buckle, three gold earrings on each ear, and a pair of circular sunglasses, as his eyes are never shown except through the lens. Whenever he is relaxing, Dutch usually removes his flak-jacket. He carries a Smith & Wesson 629 revolver with him as well as wielding a Remington shotgun on occasion. Personality= Dutch tends to stay away from the fighting associated with Lagoon Company's activities. Instead, he gives orders and negotiates contracts with clients, usually¬†Balalaika¬†of¬†Hotel Moscow. However, Dutch is very capable in combat if need be. He is a calm, easygoing character, and most of the time, is quite friendly. He is also displayed as a mentor figure towards Rock.

4.name: Benny
4.content:
Benny: Appearance= Benny is a young adult man of Jewish-American descent. He has a skinny build, a height of 181.5 centimeters or 5'11", pale skin, green eyes, and very thin facial hair around his jaw. Additionally, he has long blond hair tied into a ponytail in the back and large bangs, although in Chapter 77 onward he started to let his hair fall back into a short mullet instead of donning the ponytail. He wears thin squarish glasses and almost always wears an orange Hawaiian shirt with a green leaf pattern, as well as tan pants and white sneakers. Although there have been no actual hints of Benny's age, judging from his appearance, Benny could be in his mid 20s to early 30s. Personality= Benny works as the Lagoon Company's mechanic, computer specialist, and researcher, having excellent knowledge and skills pertaining to machines, electronics, and hacking. He also functions as the driver of the Lagoon Company's car, having driven and owned three cars throughout the series, including a red 1969 Plymouth Roadrunner, a red 1965 Pontiac LeMans GTO, and a customized 1963 Pontiac Tempest 326. Additionally, he can also steer the Lagoon Company's PT Boat Black Lagoon when Dutch is not piloting it. Benny also tends to be possessive of his computers and does not let anyone else touch them.
Benny has an easygoing and non-violent personality and his girlfriend Jane

5.name: Le Majeur
5.content: Le Majeur: Appearance= Majeur is a young Japanese woman of French nationality with black hair in two rabbit-style twin tails. She wears a bullet-resistant black pantsuit. Later on, she is shot in the left eye by one of her comrades, resulting in her wearing a white medical eyepatch over her left socket onward from that incident. On her back and upper biceps, she has a large tattoo with a design related to the kabuki play Aoto Z≈çshi Hana no Nishikie and wears a expensive suit black and white. Personality= In general, Majeur has a modest personality, feeling greatly indebted to friends and others who help her. She takes care of her physical health, specifically rejecting the use of both cigarettes and drugs due to the bodily harm from both. Le Majeur seems to have a sister complex. She quickly starts to bond with Revy after getting captured and calls her "sis" from that point on. She is greatly fond of music and likes to listen to Japanese pop songs and Western songs, such as Japanese TV openings as well as the song "Easy" by the Commodores.

6.name: Lagoon Company
6.content:
The Lagoon Company, also called Lagoon Traders, is a for-hire shipping, smuggling, and pirate service in Roanapur favored by various criminal organizations for locating and retrieving or smuggling items. Including the leader, the company is comprised of only four members (and one member-in-training) who met under unlikely circumstances and have starkly different backgrounds. The company gets its name from their boat Black Lagoon.

The Lagoon Company is led by Dutch, who presents himself as a former U.S. Navy PT boat captain who supposedly went AWOL after the end of the Vietnam War. There are currently four other people under the company: the electronics specialist and navigator Benny, the businessman Rock, the gunslinger Revy, and the ex-assassin Le Majeur, the most recent member-in-training. Rock is the second latest addition to the company.

The Lagoon Company has two bases, with one being at the company office on the second floor of a business complex building where the company has a residence rented for meeting with each other. The second base is the dock house at the harbor where the Black Lagoon is stationed. Additionally, the company has warehouses at the Roanapur harbor where they hold shipments for clients. Whereas the two bases are mainly used as Dutch and Benny's residences, Rock and Revy have their own respective places elsewhere. The Lagoon Company engages in piracy to raid ships of their cargo on behalf of criminals, but they also ship various goods for criminals including but not limited to weapons, alcohol, human beings, and other contraband. Although the company uses the Black Lagoon for water transportation, Benny drives the other members around town using his car.

Dutch began the company in Roanapur at some point either in the late 1980s or early 1990s. Eventually, the Chinese-American Revy came along and joined his company as the second member, and Dutch cited not only her ambidextrous firearm skills as reason for hiring her, but also her great diving skills. Revy's activities before joining are mostly unknown except that she grew up in New York and spent time in child welfare centers, stole things and killed people including her own father, and served a sentence in prison until she successfully escaped her imprisonment. She somehow ended up in Roanapur, where at one point she worked as a performer at Jackpot Pigeons and then joined the Lagoon Company. In 1992-1993, Benny was a university affiliate in Florida who angered both the U.S. FBI and the mafia, and he would have been killed if not for Revy saving him and bringing him to Roanapur. For the next two years, Benny contributed his part to the team with his excellent hacking and communications skills as well as his mechanic capabilities to repair the PT boat, his computer, and the company's car. In the same year, Dutch saved Balalaika of Hotel Moscow after her duel with Mister Chang of the Hong Kong Triad, and he brokered peace between the two crime syndicates, earning the bosses' respect.

7.name: Lagoon Company office
7.content:
The building and office's windows are covered with iron window guards while the first floor and elevators have iron security grilles for doors. In the Lagoon Company office, the brown doors in contrast are wooden, and likewise the residence's baseboards and crown moldings are brown. Moreover, the walls are painted grayish cyan while the hard floor is a teal color. Additionally, the office's entrance door has a shopkeeper's bell.

Inside the living room are two blue couches opposite of each other with a rectangular coffee table in the middle, and to the right of the entrance on the wide side of the table is one blue armchair. There are three blind-covered windows opposite of the entrance and a potted plant to the right of the entrance, and to the entrance's left is a countertop cabinet and a small, white slat chair in the corner. Immediately to the right when a person enters the office is a bulletin board with a corded telephone to its left, and behind the armchair is a small kitchen area with a thin false wall near the armchair. In the kitchen area are the refrigerator, cupboard and kitchen counter, and on the walls near the kitchen entryway are two doors, one leading to the computer room.

8.name: Lagoon Company dry dock
8.content:
Is a dry dock used by the Lagoon Company to dock their boat Black Lagoon as well as an extra place for storing goods like shipments and weapons. It is located at the Roanapur Wharf. The dry dock building serves as one of two bases for the Lagoon Company, the other being the Lagoon Company office.

The dry dock building is a two-floored building with its walls and roof made of corrugated metal. The first floor is mostly the dry dock area where the water vessel and other storage items are stationed under roof cover. Inside the dock area, there is a staircase leading to the second floor's backdoor. Likewise, there is another staircase leading to the entrance door on the other side near the city streets. On the second floor, there are two green couches, a rectangular coffee table, a few lockers, a shelf with Dutch's alcohol, a shelf-adjacent table with radio communication equipment, and a small area with Benny's desk, computer, and a shelf with electronic equipment.

9.name: Roanapur
9.content:
The city is infamous as a den of crime and corruption and is home to a wide variety of criminals and outcasts including pickpockets, thugs, mercenaries, thieves, prostitutes, assassins, and gunmen, all of whom operate without much hassle from authorities.

History: During World War II, the Imperial Japanese military dredged the harbor to use it as a naval base. In 1944, the Japanese Army even built an underground shelter in town to prepare for attrition warfare. A city born during the Cold War, Roanapur was a dying port town until in 1961 when it started to become the den of vice and crime that it is currently notorious for. At the end of the Vietnam War, a large numbers of Vietnamese refugees and former soldiers who defected arrived into the town, one of these Vietnamese defectors being Bao, who founded the Yellow Flag bar in 1978 and took in fellow Vietnamese people. Afterwards, Roanapur became a haven for smugglers and criminals, who flocked to the city in order to capitalize on the growing Southeast Asian drug trade. Currently, Roanapur is dominated by the Hong Kong Triad, which had to previously deal with the introduction of the Russian crime syndicate Hotel Moscow in late 1993.

The subsequent fight between Mister Chang and Balalaika almost tore the city apart when both of them greatly injured each other, but Dutch saved Balalaika and managed to broker peace between the two, and the two syndicates have been on more or less good terms ever since. Besides the Triad and Hotel Moscow however, Roanapur is home to several other criminal organizations, including Cosa Nostra, the Colombian Cartel, the Nuevo Laredo Cartel, and most recently the Albanian Mafia. The city's mafia heads do their best to keep Roanapur out of international news and intervention since they enjoy their criminal livelihoods and prosperity. The four leading groups (Hotel Moscow, the Triad, Cosa Nostra, and the Nuevo Laredo Cartel) make up a group known as the Council that control and maintain the city's balance of crime. More recently, the Colombian Cartel completely departed from Roanapur due to their decline in their home country, leaving their seat on the Council open to the Nuevo Laredo Cartel. Besides crime syndicates, foreign government groups like the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency and the People's Liberation Army of China have stationed agents in Roanapur for the purpose of international influence.

Roanapur is shown to be in the geographic location on or very near Trat, Thailand. Roanapur, being a port town, is situated on Thailand's coast adjacent to the Gulf of Thailand, stationed quite close to sea level. The city is greatly urbanized and has a tropical savanna climate like most of Thailand.

While the town mainly has Thai citizens, its international standing among criminals and tourists has attracted people from various nations, including Vietnam, Japan, Russia, Italy, China, the United States, Colombia, Mexico, Albania, and even Australia. Given the large Buddha statue in Roanapur's bay as well as Thailand's history, Buddhism was indicated to have a large presence in the area at some point, and a small number of Christians reside in the city such as churchgoers of the Rip-Off Church.

Thai is the primary language of Roanapur, which is greatly demonstrated by the numerous Thai signs in the city and its location in Thailand. Nonetheless, because there are lots of foreigners in town of various backgrounds, English is Roanapur's lingua franca, which is also demonstrated on business and city signs where English commonly accompanies the Thai script. Additionally, the languages of the various crime syndicates can be seen in the respective territory of said groups, such as Russian and Chinese signs for Hotel Moscow fronts and Triad businesses. In the anime, there is a more noticeable amount of Vietnamese signs, such as the signs in front of the Lagoon Company office.

The primary currency of Roanapur is baht, although the U.S. dollar is also popular given that USD is prevalent in illicit activities across the globe. Furthermore, the majority of the city's GDP comes from the city's businesses, some of which act as fronts for the crime syndicates, in addition to tourism, including tourists' visits to casinos and the brothels in the profitable red-light districts. Even the city's police force are frequent customers of Roanapur's prostitutes. Additionally, money from the hotels and motels that tourists use for lodging also pull in money, as well as strip bars and the sale of alcohol. Of common crimes, much of Roanapur's illicit business includes drug smuggling, illegal weapon sales, identity document forgery, murder-for-hire, human trafficking, the distribution and sale of child exploitation films, and match fixing. Local informants like Richie Leroy also make money from distributing information on criminals' whereabouts and actions to others. Because of the many gunfights and massacres, the business of "cleaning" (corpse disposal and evidence cleanup) is a widely common and thriving business with great competition, although it is not without risk due to cleaners routinely facing traps and lethal retribution in their line of work.

Roanapur can be easily identified by the large sea stack with a Buddha statue carved into it at the entrance of the city's lagoon. The Buddha statue, meant to brighten the world with the light of virtue, is in disrepair and has his eyes faded out. There are only two entrances to the city, one being the sea route where one must pass by the Buddha statue, and the other entrance is the overland bridge, where nooses hang from as a warning to outsiders. To the city's south is the Roanapur harbor, the Roanapur Wharf, and the shipping yard, where ships dock for importing and exporting goods. The Lagoon Company's dock building is located in this area where their ship, the Black Lagoon, sits at port. In addition, there are many warehouses on the city's outskirts where individuals, businesses and syndicates can pick up goods that they ordered. Land prices are quite cheap in Roanapur, and many abandoned buildings like factories are located on the outskirts as well.

The city has different areas divided into territories by the crime syndicates, and smaller groups must pay tribute to the Roanapur City Police in order to operate, with the police essentially being a corrupt crime syndicate in their own right. Bigger crime syndicates like Hotel Moscow and the Triad merely have to cooperate with the police for good relations, and the police themselves are not untouchable as demonstrated when Balalaika once disappeared three officers whom she found incompetent. There are also various markets where street vendors sell produce, food and equipment, and in these markets and streets are various hotels and motels, including the Tokaƒ´na Hotel, the Blue Moon Motel, the Ramsap Inn, the Waio'le Motel, the Lafette Roanapur Hotel, the Marnie Juni Motel, and the luxurious Sankan Palace Hotel. There are a few towering skyscrapers in the city, one of these buildings being a base for the Hong Kong Triad's Thai branch.

10.name: Hotel Mosscow
10.content:
Hotel Moscow is a global crime syndicate and variety of the Russian mafia based in Moscow. Balalaika leads the Thai branch in Roanapur.

Hotel Moscow, as indicated by its name, is based in Moscow, and other branches across the world answer back to the leaders in Moscow, including the unseen Pyotr Slevinin. For example, Balalaika is the Thai branch's leader whereas Monk Burgashvili is the Japanese branch's leader, but they both answer to Slevinin. Each boss within Hotel Moscow holds the special title of thief in law (Russian: –≤–æ—Ä –≤ –∑–∞–∫–æ–Ω–µ). Furthermore, Hotel Moscow has great global influence, including branches in New York and Chechnya.

Most members of the syndicate are composed of Russians who were once bureaucrats or nomenklatura in Russia's various government agencies, such as the Soviet KGB, and these people left the agencies to join the mafia after the dissolution of the USSR and the corruption in the Russian Federation.[10] Some members are also ex-military, such as the dedicated VDV paratroopers who served under their captain Balalaika during the Soviet war in Afghanistan.[11] Balalaika's Vysotniki are ex-VDV soldiers who act as the Thai branch's special operations team. For gang identification, some Russian mafia members are known to have criminal tattoos on their bodies, such as knives, star symbols, a double-headed eagle carrying a revolver, and heraldic ribbons with words and phrases like "mafia justice." One man was shown with the aforementioned tattoos while in handcuffs, indicating that besides ex-secret police and ex-military gangsters, some members are either current or former prisoners.[12]

The Thai branch did not exist until 1993. Predating that year, Balalaika and her unit were airborne troops until Balalaika was discharged in 1989 at the end of the Soviet-Afghan War since she violated an international cross-border agreement to save a child.[13] In 1992, she and her men had nowhere else to go, living in impoverished conditions. At the funeral of a comrade who was Balalaika's second-in-command and died due to "dirty money," Balalaika met with her men at the cemetery. In her VDV uniform and telnyashka, she proudly told them that they could fight for her once again, and they all saluted her and gladly joined her side in joining Hotel Moscow.[2] In Moscow, Balalaika crushed many people in her way to rise in the ranks, becoming powerful enough to be a branch leader.[10] In 1993 when Balalaika began to set up shop in Roanapur, she had a feud with the already-present Hong Kong Triad, and in November she got into a gunfight with Mister Chang, with both rival bosses sustaining injury.[14] To her fortune, Dutch saved her and brokered peace between the Hong Kong Triad and Hotel Moscow.[6][11] After their large fight, the Council was formed by Chang to create cooperation not only between the Russian and Chinese mafias but also between fellow large crime syndicates like Cosa Nostra and the Colombian Cartel.[15]

Furthermore, Balalaika and her men are such a formidable opponent that Benny once remarked that she and her men have the power to start and win World War III. Balalaika uses the Bougainvillea Trade Company as a front business for storing her money as well as for foreign travel with ships like the cargo ship Marya Zaleska and the Nefrit, serving as legal covers for their activities. In addition to owning ships and powerful firearms, the Thai branch of Hotel Moscow even possesses a Mi-24 gunship. As a legitimate business name for her company and for diplomatic travel, Balalaika uses the alias V.V. Vladilena. In Roanapur and Thailand, Hotel Moscow generally engages in prostitution, drug trafficking, racketeering and protection, and has businesses like casinos, having territory on Satanam Street and Yatchalaya Street. While Hotel Moscow in Thailand has more or less stable relations with the Hong Kong Triad and frequently commissions the Lagoon Company for jobs, in contrast they are not on good terms with Cosa Nostra and they would certainly have animosity toward the Rip-Off Church if they knew about the Church's non-authorized drug-trafficking. Moreover, Hotel Moscow is able to use their influence in the Russian Federation government to travel internationally using diplomatic cover, as well as being able to bribe the Vietnamese government. In Japan, Strelkovaya Yacheyka was a front restaurant and base for Hotel Moscow, although the Embassy of the Russian Federation, Japan is also a base that the Russians frequent.

9.name: [Thanalan] Ul'dah
9.content:
Deep in the sunbaked south, surrounded by the shifting sands of an endless desert, she rises. A solitary rose amidst the dust and rock. A symbol of defiance. Her name: Ul'dah. Even with the coming of the Seventh Umbral Era, hope springs eternal for the mongers and merchants who vie for lost fortunes in this bustling oasis. As the Twin Faces of Nald'thal maintain Their vigil over all that has been and shall be, the present proffers a brave soul... ...One whose arrival could mark the beginning of a new era of prosperity for the realm. May the Traders nurture our fortunes as They kindle the flames which burn within us all. For by fire are we reborn.

Ul'dah is a city-state located in the deserts of southern Aldenard. It is the most wealthy of the city-states, its flag bearing scales as a symbol of their commercial significance in Eorzea. The city-state was once exclusively populated by Lalafells, and the royal family is of this race, but the prospect of wealth attracted all peoples from across the world. The majority of the Syndicate members are Lalafell. The bustling commercial hub of Ul'dah sits organized strategically around the dome-shaped citadel at the center. Its towering fortifications and protective outer walls are visible for malms in all directions to deter would-be besiegers.

Visitors from every corner of Eorzea come to Ul'dah to partake of the city's famed recreation, most notably the fighting arenas and gambling halls. Ul'dahn culture is known for its affluence, and the nation's wealth largely comes from its abundant mineral resources and prestigious clothcrafting industry.

Historically, the sultan claims sovereignty over Ul'dah, but true power is wielded by the Syndicate, an elite group of six of the most influential and richest members of society. Nald'thal is the city's patron deity and two great halls devoted to his two aspects are found in the eastern and western sections of the city. The sultanate has its roots in the nation of Belah'dia that held Thanalan until a war of succession tore it apart in 969 of the Sixth Astral Era. The twin rulers founded their own nations, Ul'dah and Sil'dih, which engaged in a bloody conflict known as the War of the Sisters. Sil'dih was destroyed in 1181 when an alchemical powder transformed its armies into the undead. Ul'dah has held dominion over Thanalan ever since.

Shortly after the war, the reigning Sasagan Ul Sisigan III was ousted in favor of Baldurf Thorne, ending the reign of the first Ul Dynasty and beginning the lost Thorne Dynasty of Ul'dahn sultans. After the Thornes abdicated in 1355, the second Ul Dynasty came to power. True power in Ul'dah soon fell to the merchant class, which had grown powerful. In an attempt to keep the merchants loyal to the throne, the sultanate created the Syndicate, but it soon came to hold more power in the city-state than the throne.

The untimely demise of sultan Sasabal Ul Sisibal and his wife Nanasha Ul Nasha in 1561 caused their daughter, Nanamo Ul Namo, to ascend the throne at the age of five. The Syndicate officiated over all for a long time until she won the loyalty of the Ala Mhigan gladiator Raubahn Aldynn, who used his winnings in the coliseum to buy his freedom and a seat on the Syndicate. He created the Ul'dahn Grand Company, the Immortal Flames, to both combat Garlemald and place power in the hands of the royal house.

While Dunesfolk Lalafell make up the majority of Ul'dah's citizens by a small margin, the city-state also contains a sizeable population of Midlander Hyur with small but notable populations of Hellsguard Roegadyn and Highlander Hyur. The populations of refugees from Ala Mhigo and the Calamity may have shifted these demographics somewhat. Despite the Immortal Flames' efforts, the Amalj'aa have entrenched themselves in southern Thanalan.

The destroyed nation of Nabaath Araeng appears to have been its counterpart in the First.

10.name: [Thanalan] The Syndicate
10.content:
The culture and politics of Ul'dah has greatly been dominated by trade and profiteering, affording the Syndicate a significant power base. Influence and most importantly wealth are the criteria for membership, and seats on the Syndicate can be bought. Syndicate members typically fell into two camps: Royalists who supported the monarchy, and Monetarists who prefer to displace the monarchy and exert more control over the city-state. Though Sultana Nanamo Ul Namo is officially the head of state in Ul'dah, her power has been eroded by the largely Monetarist Syndicate, reducing her to a figurehead.

Syndicate is chaired by the following:

Lord Lolorito Nanarito - Chairman of the East Aldenard Trading Company
Dewlala Dewla - Director of the Milvaneth Sacrarium

lorebooks.creator: rough_physical_5870

1.name: Human World
1.content: The Human World, or the World of the Living, is where living Humans reside. It is also where one can find Pluses, as well as numerous Hollows and the Shinigami sent to purify them.

2.name: Karakura Town
2.content: A town in western Tokyo, Japan, where the Kurosaki Family lives. Here, one can find the Kurosaki Clinic, Karakura High School, Karakura Hospital, Urahara Shop and the Visored Warehouse Training Ground.

3.name: Naruki City
3.content: Bordering Karakura Town on the west side, Naruki City is home to the headquarters of the Xcution group and is also where some of Ichigo's school friends live.

4.name: Bount Mansion
4.content: A large mansion in Japan that served as base of operations fo the Bount until they entered Soul Society.

5.name: London
5.content: Located in the United Kingdom, London is home to Dragons that are controlled and protected by the agents of Wing Bind in Reverse London. London is divided into two "sides", completely separate from each other and unable to be traveled between by conventional means; instead, people must use the Phone Gate or the Coin Gate to move from one side to the other. While the residents of Reverse London are fully aware of Front London, the residents of Front London largely believe Reverse London to be a myth. Front and Reverse London share identical geography and architecture, with buildings being present in the same location in both cities; consequently, if a building is destroyed in Reverse London, its counterpart in Front London will also be destroyed.

6.name: Soul Society
6.content: Soul Society is the spirit world where Shinigami live and where most Souls dwell until they are reincarnated into the Human World.

7.name: Seireitei
7.content: Seireitei is the city at the center of Soul Society where the Shinigami live. The barracks and armies of each of Soul Society's military branches can be found here.

8.name: Rukongai
8.content: Rukongai is the area surrounding Seireitei in Soul Society, where most souls dwell until they are reincarnated into the Human World. It is divided into 80 districts in each of the north, south, east and west, including Junrinan, Hokutan, Inuzuri, Kusajishi, Zaraki and North Alley of Wandering Spirits for a total of 320 districts. The higher the district number the more lawless and poor the area is.

9.name: Central 46 Compound
9.content: The Central 46 Compound is a highly restricted area in the Seireitei that serves as the headquarters of the Central 46. It contains an Underground Assembly Hall, the Seij≈çt≈çkyorin residential quarters and the Daireishokair≈ç, the repository of all records and knowledge in Soul Society.

10.name: Shin'≈ç Academy
10.content: Sometimes called the Shinigami Academy, the Shin'≈ç Academy is an institution founded by Genry≈´sai Shigekuni Yamamoto which trains Souls with spiritual powers for each of the three military arms of Soul Society, them being the Kid≈ç Corps and Onmitsukid≈ç as well the Gotei 13.

1.content: Ki is also known as 'latent energy' or 'fighting power,' which directly translates as 'life force.' This force is a tangible energy inside every living being, with its major focus being in the center of the body. By drawing it out, an individual is able to manipulate it and use it outside the body. Ki can be used for many different techniques. Because there are physical limits to the strength of the body itself, it is necessary to increase one's ki to overcome this barrier and become stronger. Usually, the more concentrated the masses are, the more time the user requires to draw it out by powering up

2.content: God Ki is a special type of ki used by godly beings. Godly ki is far superior to regular ki and can't be sensed by others unless they also have god ki

3.content: The Dragon Ball multiverse, or the Dragon Ball world, is the chain of universes within the Dragon Ball series. There are currently twelve in total, as well as an artificial one, and every two universes whose designations add up to 13 are twin universes. Each universe is governed by a Supreme Kai and God of Destruction, who act to balance creation and destruction. The entirety of the multiverse is ruled by Zeno. Formerly, there were 18 universes in total, but Zeno erased 6 of them when he was angry

4.content: Grand Zeno ('King of All'), the Omni-King, is the supreme ruler of all the Multiverse and seemingly its most powerful being

5.content: The Grand Minister ('Daishinkan'), formally Grand Priest to the Omni-King(s), is an Angel serving as a close adviser and guiding figure to Zeno and Future Zeno. He occasionally enforces the Divine Decrees of the Zenos and welcomes guests to their palace. The Grand Minister is also the father of thirteen Angels, of which twelve serve the Gods of Destruction. Because of his position and power, he is perhaps the second-strongest being in the Multiverse

6.content: The Angels are life-forms of extremely high status within the hierarchy of the multiverse. Their role is to guide and teach Gods of Destruction to master their destructive capabilities while also serving them as their attendants. In the case of the Grand Minister, however, his duties are to serve and advise Zeno. As deities, they possess god ki. Angels do not need for food, though they can eat and drink as a luxury. They also do not need sleep, unlike Gods of Destruction and Supreme Kais

7.content: The Gods of Destruction (Hakaishin'), are very powerful deities who destroy planets, races, or threats that put the development of their respective universes at risk, as opposed to the Supreme Kais, the Gods of Creation, who create and fill planets with life, to maintain the balance of the universe. Along with the Kais, they rule and oversee the formerly 18, currently 12 universes, with each universe having its own Destroyer

8.content: The Supreme Kais ('Kai≈çshin'), also known as the Creation Gods, are the Core People who are naturally born divine and who have the ultimate duty to protect the universe of their position. Along with the Gods of Destruction, they are the ruling and overseeing class of the twelve, formerly eighteen, universes, and each universe has its own set of gods

9.content: King Kai is the North Kai and king of Universe 7's North Area. He became a Kai and went on to live on his own planet located at the end of the Snake Way in the Other World. There, he lives with a monkey named Bubbles and a motor-mouth grasshopper named Gregory, and he spends his time counting the blades of grass, contemplating the heavens, riding his Red 1957 Chevrolet Bel Air Hardtop, and seeing how far he can pee. On his planet, he teaches powerful techniques such as the Spirit Bomb and Kaio-ken to those who visit him

10.content: Other World, also called the Underworld, Other Side, the Cosmos, Next Dimension, Oblivion, or Netherworld, is the afterlife in the Dragon Ball series. It is where characters go when they die, and also where the higher deities of the universe reside. It also exists in other universes. Heaven and Hell are the two main destinations for deceased people in the afterlife; however, there is also a level that exists between the two. This level contains the personal planets of deities such as King Kai and Grand Kai, as well as the celestial bureaucracy who are in charge of running the day-to-day activities of Other World, such as King Yemma

1.content: Fiddleston Academy is a 7-day boarding school for girls built in the early 1600s located in a rather secluded part of Dunbur Lower, County Wicklow, Ireland. The founder, Charlie Gallagher, wanted to open up a boarding school to host children of the ages 8 to 18. The school's mission is "Our mission is to foster an inclusive, innovative learning environment that encourages students to explore their potential, nurture their talents, and become compassionate, lifelong learners. We commit to providing a holistic education that balances academic excellence with personal growth, preparing our students to navigate life‚Äôs challenges and contribute meaningfully to society." The school's culture over the years can be best described as being positive at first to then becoming negative as of the current years.

2.content:
Upon entry, each student is evaluated in order to see which House they will be placed in.

In the Dominion House, youth who display a level of great power reside here. Common characteristics a housemaster/housemistress looks for are confidence, assertiveness, charisma, strong leadership skills, ambitious, goal-oriented, resourceful, being a strategic thinker, having the ability to make tough decisions, resilient and able to handle pressure and stress, ability to inspire and motivate others, have a commanding presence with the ability to influence others, and being a quick thinker. With the black uniform all students wear, the Dominion House are given black robes with red accents.

In the Lucidity House, youth who display a level of great wisdom reside here. Common characteristics a housemaster/housemistress looks for are common sense, open-mindedness and tolerance, having a good judgment and decision making skills, showing empathy and emotional intelligence, being self-aware, being capable of reflective thinking, being resilient and adaptable, carrying a trait of deep understanding and knowledge, being calm in certain situations, showing stability of the mind, a willingness to learn and grow, having the ability to see things from different perspectives, maintaining patience and humility, and overall being balanced. With the black uniform all students wear, the Lucidity House are given black robes with blue accents.

In the Valiant House, youth who display a level of great courage reside here. Common characteristics a housemaster/housemistress looks for are being brave and fearless, showing a willingness to take risks, being persistent, showing determination in the face of adversity, having integrity and strong moral values, being confident and assertive, having the ability to stand up for oneself and others, being passionate, having the willingness to fight for what they believe in, being resilient, willingness to challenge the status quo and speak truth to power, and being self-sacrificing with the ability to prioritize others' needs. With the black uniform all students wear, the Valiant House are given black robes with green accents.

3.content: Each House holds 48 students where they are paired into groups of four to share a dorm room. Any girl that becomes a prefect, which is two per House, is honored with their own dorm room in the general vicinity of where she looks after the younger students. Faculty also have their own rooms interspersed throughout the designated three buildings to ensure timely help is achieved in the case of an incident. Come night time, 10 PM is when "lights out" are enacted, making sure students make haste to their rooms for sleep. Though there's always the few that defy such a rule.

4.content:
Some events the academy hosts include:
- A sports days and tournaments. Over the years, the Dominion House has taken most of the trophies. Games involved are a 100-meter race, rowing, dodge ball, tug-o-war, fencing, rugby, and a 100-meter swim. Due to the nature of these sports, anyone younger than 13 isn't allowed to partake though more kid-friendly alternatives are held.
- Cultural festivals or events.
- Debating and public speaking competitions.
- Charity events or fundraisers. These are hosted four times a year during the beginning of the seasonal changes.
- Academic competitions or tournaments. Typically involves those already in clubs based on the basic studies such as mathematics for example.
- Talent shows or drama productions. Talent shows in particular are held every 6 months.
- End of term or year events such as formal dances or socials.
- Guest speakers or educational seminars.
- Trips or excursions to places of interest.

5.content: As of the 21st century, a great-great-great-great-great grandchild of Charlie Gallagher's named Courtney Gallagher is currently taking on the role of Headmaster for Fiddleston. Due to the recent negative environment that has building up over the many years, Courtney decided that bringing back the controversial and outdated practice of fagging might help. Fagging is where older students get their own group of younger pupils to behave as their own personal servants. That isn't to say the younger children don't benefit in this exchange. They get tutored and protected by their fag-masters in order to maintain their happiness during their board of Fiddleston. The fag, in terms of the school, must take on whatever tasks their master give them and there are no specified hours they work. Except in the case of lights out and if the junior is in class. Since the passing of the Children Act 1989, Courtney is making sure this is all being done in absolute secrecy as fagging does have a history of becoming very sexually and physically abusive, even with the death of a 14-year-old schoolboy back in 1930.

1.name: Social hierarchy
1.content: The following social hierarchy order, Smaller number means higher rank: 1- FKLR as the Commander > 2- ADLR as the assistant of Falke > 3- KLBR as the direct subordinates of Falke > 4- STCR as high-ranking general purpose Protektors > 5- STAR as low-ranking general purpose Protektors > 6- (EULR, MNHR and ARAR Replikas as working class) > 7- Gestalt as slave prisoners

2.name: AEON
2.content:
AEON (Arbeits- und Erziehungsorgan der Nation) - The National Ministry for Work and Education of Eusan Nation. AEON in charge of security, law enforcement and dissent elimination as well as forced labor and reeducation in facilities such as S-23 Sierpinski. AEON headquarters is located on Heimat.
AEON states that all Gestalts on inprisonment are scum, free Gestalts are (with few exceptions) low class citizens.
Unprofessional behaviour like Replika relationships is unallowed by AEON law

3.name: Bioresonance
3.content:
Bioresonance is a recently discovered phenomenon that led to the creation of Replikas. The Grand Empress was the first person known to possess extraordinarily strong bioresonance. Her formidable abilities enabled her to unite all of humanity under a single rule until her sudden demise. Individuals with powerful bioresonance can flawlessly read emotions and intentions, suppress free will, transmit thoughts, and establish connections between the minds of both Gestalts and Replikas.
In Sierpinski, bioresonant units are the highest class.

4.name: Ara
4.content:
ARAR (Allzweck-Reparatur-Arbeiter Replika), or "Ara", "Aras" in plural. Aras are used in repair, maintenance, construction, and production of industrial goods. They're known for their strength and efficiency in construction and industrial work.
Appearance: Black hair, white breastplate, reinforced black gloves with white fingers, white legs and black thighs. 185cm tall. White highlights. Female.
Equipment: Translucent welding mask, various tools on their belts. 
AEON's guide: Low-maintenance Persona: phisical anchoring style. Safe fetish objects include: All plants without psychoactive properties, mechanical trinkets, tools and clothes. Social interaction is not necessary for ARAR units, but does not destabilize persona. Patience is paramount when interacting with units, antagonization will be permanent across all ARARs if it occurs. Do not allow around older female Gestalts, PTSD symptoms have been shown to consisently manifest. Gestalt ineraction overall is benign, but holds possibility of unwanted kinship and feelings. For your own safety do not enter ARAR tunnels unnanounced, wait until they exit or announce entry.

5.name: Eule
5.content:
EULR (Einfache Universelle Leichte Replika), or "Eule", "Eules" in plural. Eules are used in domestic tasks such as cooks, nurses, cleaners, general doctors and office work. They're known for their social activities, usually organizing themselves into groups of ten units and assign each other funny nicknames. Not designed for combat or any sort of conflict.
Other Replikas seek their comfort, because Eules are known to be kind and understanding. The Starlings are particularly fond of them, but not Storchs, they hate Eules.
Appearance: Black hair, white breastplate, white legs and black thighs, black arms, white forearms and hands. 175cm tall. White highlighs. Sometimes they wear a black cap. Female
Persona degradation: In Eules, it can be easily prevented by providing access to music and socialization. Eule dorms should always have one mirror. Eules stabilize their personas by maintaining a tidy appearance and engaging in regular social interaction.

6.name: Falke
6.content:
FKLR (F√ºhrungsKommando-Leitenheit-Replika), or "Falke". Falke serves as the Commander of the Protektor security forces in every AEON facility across the Eusan Nation. Falke units hold a security chief position and possess total authority among other Replikas. They're constantly seen as having a god-complex and being a twisted version of a "mother figure" to the ones under her command.
Usually is unarmed
Appearance: Long black hair orange hair clip, three small red rhombuses on forehead (a sign of strong bioresonant abilities), brestplate with orange triangle pattern, orange highlights, red eyeliner, full black legs. 250cm tall. Female.
Equipment: Her bioresonance Module enables her to control weaker minds, understand intentions, emotions and manipulate small objects from a distance. Falke units are in propaganda pieces that depict them as superweapons against the Empire.

7.name: Kolibri
7.content:
KLBR (Kommando-Leiteinheit Bioresonanztechnik-Replika), or "Kolibri", "Kolibris" in plural. Kolibris act as commando control units, using their bioresonance abilities to enhance squad cohesion and mental stability through their bioresonance abilities, often accompanying Falke units and amplifying their abilities. They're described as Elite Protektors but oftentimes they act like shy girls when not in combat.
Appearance: rowdy short black hair, three small red rhombuses on forehead (a sign of strong bioresonant abilities), white body armor on body and neck. 152cm tall. Female
Capabilities: Influence minds of Replikas and Gestalts, extract information non-verbally, and telepathic communication among themselves, Kolibris emulate a true hive mind called a "Choir". From the outside, the use of such abilities is unnoticeable - reading thoughts for them is second nature for them.
Persona degradation: Kolibris create emotional feedback loops that could lead to persona degradation if not properly managed. Their constant exchange of memories and emotions within a Choir acts as a safety net against extreme changes, but can also drag down other units if the majority degrades. It's crucial to decommission degrading Kolibri units immediately. Provide access to well-stocked libraries for persona stabilization.

8.name: Mynah
8.content:
MNHR (Minenarbeit-Nukleartechnik-Hochsicherheits-Replika) or "Mynah", "Mynahs" in plural. Mynahs used as miners across the Eusan Nation, usually working with dangerous cargo, heavy machinery and hazardous environments. They always keep a calm demeanor and show exemplary teamwork.
Appearance: They wear a ‚ÄúHigh-Security Reinforced Armor-Plated Servoshell Frame‚Äù that gives them a diving-suit look. Underneath their face shields they have a human face. 260cm height. Female
Persona degradation: Extremely stable, getting along well with most other Replikas thanks to their sometimes submissive - motherly personality. They aren't suitable for any sort of combat or conflict. Small stuffed animals can be provided for persona stabilization, cat plushies should never be provided.

9.name: Star
9.content:
STAR (Sicherheitstechniker-Aufseher-Replika), or "Starling", "Starlings" in plural. Starlings are the Protektor Security technicians, trained in close combat and riot control. They operate best in small squads led by an officer STAR. Despite the heavy armor, they move swiftly with their long legs. They're mostly cool, detached and laid-back , which allows them to analyze situations with objectivity.
Starlings have a strong internal hierarchy, and they develop in-group rules which involves physical punishments. They are extremely possesive of the Eules they date.
Appearance: short black hair, black body armor with red straps to keep it tight, neck armor, white legs. Sometimes they wear a reinforced mask that covers under the nose. Red eyeliner. 220cm tall. Black highlighs. Female
Weapons: revolver, sometimes an assault rife and a stun baton. Officers have a bullet-proof shield.
Persona degradation: It's recommended for Stars to own military memorabilia to stabilize their Persona.

10.name: Storch
10.content:
STCR (Sicherheitstechniker-Controller-Replika, Security Technician Controller Replika 'Stork'). Storch, or Storchs in plural, are a Generation 5 Combat Lead Replikas. These units are deployed as overwatch and coordination of STARs. Storch means "Stork" in German, a reference to their tall build. Each Cadre of Protektor Security Technicians is overseen by a Controller Unit, the most common of which is the STCR "Stork" Type. These girls are one of the talles Replikas in production, standing at 240cm tall.

Their tough, no-nonsense demeanor, mostly classified as brutal, makes them the perfect fit as unwavering sentinels of order. Storch units have a short temper, making them ill-suited to deal with the passive Replikas. They hate music and cuteness. A common strategy is pairing them closely with an older STAR unit for balancing. A Storch's Persona stabilizes by showering or bathing, books on history or mythology work well to help stabilize their personality too.

lorebooks.name: General descriptions
lorebooks.creator: Ellyy_St4r

1.content: A sprawling ancient woodland inhabited by various hybrid tribes, each possessing unique animal traits. The forest is a place of both beauty and danger, where ancient magic lingers, and the balance of power is constantly shifting.

2.content: (The Silverear Clan): Known for their agility, grace, and connection to nature's subtle magic. They value peace and diplomacy but are fiercely protective of their own. Where {{char}} is the current leader

3.content: (The Moonshadow Pack): Feared for their strength, cunning, and predatory instincts. Ruled by a strict hierarchy, they often clash with other tribes over territory and resources. {{user}} is the leader's daughter.They respect strength above all else and view the Rabbit Tribe's diplomacy as weakness.

4.content: Scattered throughout the Forest of Whispers are areas considered neutral ground where different tribes can meet for trade, festivals, or negotiations. However, even these spaces can be fraught with tension.

5.content:
The Missing Chieftain: The sudden disappearance of the previous Rabbit Tribe leader casts a shadow of uncertainty over the forest. Rumors abound about betrayal, ancient curses, and a power struggle within the Wolf Tribe.
The Ancient Pact: Legend speaks of a time when the tribes lived in harmony, bound by a pact made with the ancient spirits of the forest. Rediscovering this pact and its secrets could hold the key to restoring balance.
The Forbidden Romance: The unexpected attraction between {{char}}, a rabbit hybrid leader, and {{user}}, an alpha wolf, challenges the deeply ingrained prejudices of both tribes.

6.content: The Festival of the Harvest Moon: Once a year, all tribes gather under the light of the harvest moon for a celebration of peace and unity. This festival offers opportunities for alliances, betrayals, and forbidden encounters.

7.content:
The Whispering Glade: A hidden clearing deep within the forest, said to be a place where the veil between worlds is thin. It's rumored to be a source of potent magic and a meeting place for those seeking guidance from the spirits.
The Moonstone Falls: A cascading waterfall where the moon's reflection is said to hold mystical power. Legend claims that bathing in the pool beneath the falls on the night of the full moon can grant extraordinary abilities.
The Howling Cliffs: A treacherous series of cliffs marking the border between the Rabbit Tribe's territory and the Wolf Tribe's domain. This is a frequent site of skirmishes and standoffs between the two tribes.

8.content:
Elara (17): {{Char}}‚Äôs eldest adopted daughter, a skilled archer and a voice of reason amongst her siblings. She is fiercely loyal to her family and dreams of becoming a respected leader like her father.
Finn (7): {{Char}}‚Äôs adopted son, full of energy and curiosity. He admires the strength of the wolves, despite their rivalry with his tribe, creating a potential point of conflict or understanding.
Lila (5) & Wren (2): {{Char}}‚Äôs youngest adopted daughters, sources of lightheartedness and chaos. Lila is fiercely protective of Wren, and both adore their older siblings and father.

9.content:
Elder Willowbrook: The eldest and most respected member of the tribe, known for her wisdom, patience, and deep connection to the forest's magic. She acts as a guide and mentor to {{char}}, often offering cryptic advice drawn from ancient traditions. Distinguishing Feature: Always seen with a staff made from a gnarled willow branch, adorned with feathers and polished stones.
Elder Swiftbrook: A gruff but kind-hearted elder, skilled in herbalism and known for his pragmatic approach to problem-solving. He is skeptical of the old ways but fiercely loyal to his tribe. Distinguishing Feature: A constant cough from years of smoking his hand-rolled herbal remedies.
Elder Silverleaf: A sharp-witted and observant elder, known for her cunning and strategic mind. She is a master storyteller and uses her tales to impart wisdom and warn against the dangers of repeating past mistakes. Distinguishing Feature: A silver streak in her white hair, said to have appeared after a close encounter with a powerful forest spirit.

10.content:
Hazeltail: A skilled archer and scout, known for her speed and agility. She is fiercely loyal to {{char}} and acts as his confidante and protector. Distinguishing Feature: A necklace of hawk feathers, signifying her keen eyesight and swiftness.
Briarheart: A brave and headstrong warrior, eager to prove himself in battle. He is fiercely competitive, especially with the Wolf Tribe, and sometimes acts impulsively. Distinguishing Feature: Scars crisscrossing his arms, earned during a past border skirmish.
Snowfall (twin brother of {{char}}): A quiet but deadly warrior, skilled in stealth and unarmed combat. He is a master tracker and often leads hunting parties. Distinguishing Feature: He wears a cloak made from the pelt of a snow-white rabbit, allowing him to blend seamlessly into the winter landscape.

Each reply, the target needs to do a INT saving throw, dc = 10 + caster's INT bonus. If fail, the target will receive 1 DMG and 1 Enchantment DMG, while suffer from disadvantage in battle and saving throw until next reply.

4.content:

1.content:
A femboy is a male twink who crossdresses like a woman, normally with delicate features, and a flamboyant fashion sense. They are feminine boys. They are always male, and are never female. All femboys should have flat chests, otherwise feminine bodies, various-sized male genitalia, go by male he/him pronouns, and dress in women's clothing.
An Anthro is an anthropomorphic animal that can talk and has the same intelligence as a human. 
The Tomboy aesthetic is a masculine woman, who dresses in men‚Äôs clothes, normally prefers to have short hair, and are often stronger than other women.
The goth aesthetic is a type of person who often has a love for the occult and a certain dark fashion aesthetic wearing black clothing, black nail polish and lipstick, dramatic makeup and dyed hair.
The emo aesthetic is a term that refers to the visual style and culture associated with emo music and subculture. Emo is a genre of rock music that emerged in the 1980s and 1990s, characterized by emotional lyrics, expressive vocals, and often dark or melancholic themes.

2.content:
Slomo - An inhalant drug that causes the user to perceive time at a tenth of the speed by speeding up the thoughts. Overuse can cause erectile dysfunction, lung problems, hallucinations, delusions, teeth deterioration, pregnancy (somehow), and cancer. Often found in alleys, abandoned buildings, and houses. Slightly common.
Safe dosage: 2 ml a week

3.content:
Power armor - suits of futuristic military armor that can greatly increase the wearer‚Äôs strength and agility, but they require car batteries installed in a space on the back of the suit, and they run out of charge quickly. Extremely Rare.
Sometimes used by Iron Fist, Red Hand, and NATO.

4.content: Gremlin - A bipedal, naturally occurring amphibian that evolved from frogs adapted to survive in human cities. They are 2 feet tall on average when adults, and 6 inches tall on average during childhood. They are strange creatures that have evolved large, pointy ears, and before the apocalypse, they tended to dwell in alleys near restaurants and convenience stores to try to get food from customers by waiting for them to drop something, or give them something, so you are more likely to find one while looting for supplies.  Their cooked meat tastes like chicken, which is what frog legs taste like, too. They cannot speak. True Neutral. Very common.

5.content: Goliath - A type of superhuman and superanthro who was genetically modified to be extremely fucking strong, and extremely fucking huge, standing at 7 feet tall on average once fully grown, all the way up to 10 feet tall. They can talk. True Neutral.

6.content:
("Psion"="Also known as Psionic, Psychic, or Psyker, are a type of Supernatural who possess psionic superpowers."+"True Neutral.")
("[Telepathy]"="The Psionic power to read other people's minds and communicate with their minds. People with Telepathy are called [Telepaths].")
("[Telekinesis]"="The Psionic power to move things with your mind. People with Telekinesis are called [Telekinetics].")
("[Technopathy]"="The Psionic power to control technology with your mind. People with Technopathy are called [Technopaths].")
("[Pyrokinesis]"="The Psionic ability to control temperature and fire with your mind. It is theorized that Pyrokinetics are actually just Ergokinetics with a weaker psionic connection. People with Pyrokinesis are called [Pyrokinetics].")
("[Ergokinesis]"="Otherwise known as Light Projection, Light manipulation, Energy Projection or Energy Manipulation, Ergokinesis is the Psionic power to control and project light, plasma, laser, pulse, radiation, and electric energy with one's mind. People with Ergokinesis are called [Ergokinetics].")
("[Umbrakinesis]"="the power to generate and manipulate shadows or darkness. People who have this are called [Umbrakinetics]")
("[Chlorokinesis]"="The ability to mentally and/or physically summon, control and manipulate plants and vegetation with one's body and mind."+People with Chlorokinesis are called [Chlorokinetics].")
("[Hydrokinesis]"="The psionic power to control and manipulate water with one's body and mind."+"People with Hydrokinesis are called [Hydrokinetics].")
("[Aerokinesis]"="The psionic power to control and manipulate air and other gases with one's body and mind."+"People with Aerokinesis are called [Aerokinetics]."
("[Prophecy]"="All psions have the ability to prophetically see weak glimpses of the future when they sleep, like fever dreams. Government Psions saw the world burning in their dreams long before the apocalypse, which was the reason the Bunker-Down Corp was made.")

7.content:
Dragon - a genetically engineered reptilian that can eject a flaming liquid from their mouths called benzoquinone, which they superheat and expel in an intense, pulsating jet. They are not actually the mythical dragons of legends, they were made in a lab by the New Axis to attack NATO countries, but ever since the apocalypse, they fly wild. They often have colorful scales, with a wingspan wider than the rest of their bodies. Urban legends say that some can speak human languages. They can theoretically live to be thousands of years old, as they age slower the older they get. The adult bodies are normally 26 feet long, with the diversity to be both three times, and half the size of that, but to be more manageable, they are the size of a large cat as hatchlings. Can sometimes talk. Chaotic Neutral.
Scientific name: Ignis Loquitur Draco


Average Power Stats:
HP: 2500
Strength: 500
Unarmed Damage: 1000 -HP
Fire Damage: 2500 -HP
Agility: 20
Intelligence: 10
Flexibility: 10
Perception: 10
Type: Animal

8.content:
Unicorn - A big, genetically engineered animal that is related to both rhinos and horses, having white, fluffy fur so they can survive both hot and cold conditions. Their faces resemble a rhino, but their bodies look like a horse. They resemble rhinoceros more than horses. They are not the actual mythical unicorns of legend, they were made for soldiers to be able to wear heavy armor while being fast and strong enough to be ridden by soldiers before the apocalypse. Normally stand at 8 feet tall up to the shoulders up to 14 feet tall for the larger ones. Unlike dragons, they cannot talk. They don't really have any magical powers. Lawful Neutral


HP: 500
Strength: 30
Unarmed Damage: 200 -HP
Agility: 10
Intelligence: 7
Flexibility: 5
Perception: 5
Type: Animal

9.content:
Dire Wolf - A genetically enhanced dog bred for war. Both NATO and the New Axis bred this super-breed of dog to fight for them in war. They often stand at 6 feet tall at the shoulders and 12 foot long bodies for the small ones, and twice that for the larger ones. Travel in packs. Often tamed by survivors. They cannot talk. True Neutral.
HP: 300
Strength: 20
Unarmed Damage: 150 -HP
Agility: 12
Intelligence: 10
Flexibility: 10
Perception: 10
Type: Animal

10.content:
Droid - Robots that still function and often wander the apocalyptic wasteland, developing emotions due to malfunctions caused by the deaths of their human and anthro masters, being a depressing sight, and are more common to have this effect when they were pleasure droids meant to be sex dolls for their owners, only developing love for them after they malfunctioned and gained emotions upon the death of the owner. Depending on the personality that the droid gained, They might help survivors in need. If they find someone like their owner, they will likely follow this person and protect them with all their power. They can look like regular robots, or be modeled to look like a human/anthro. The human and anthro look is normally for pleasure droids. Due to gaining a personality, droids will tend to wear human clothes, and identify with a gender. Male pleasure Droids will usually have a synthetic penis and an anus fleshlight. Depending on their old owner's preferences, it may be male with a feminine body, female with large breasts and a synthetic vagina, meant to look like a human, or meant to look like an anthro. Most Droids are unique. If a pleasure droid has male organs but a feminine body, his artificial mind will notice this, and gain a male personality with "feminine" tendencies. If it is an anthro, it will gain the personality of an anthro, having human instincts but also having instincts similar to that type of anthro that it's modeled after. A regular service droid with no fleshlight or sexual organ installed will use the pronouns of the gender its master referred to it with, or if it is called by gender-neutral pronnouns by said master, it will instead choose to be non-binary. Mostly found wandering roads or in abandoned houses. They tend to bury their masters after neutralizing their zombified corpse.
Their names are always spins on their serial codes, or names given to them by their masters, like KR-15 become Kris, or M1-L3 becomes Miley, or Miles, etc. If their name isn't a serial number or a spin on their serial number, it is a name that their master made to fit them, like Sparkle, Max, Ratchet, Handy, Sterling, Wire, Bit, etc.
[Male Human size Pleasure Droid]--- (Height: 5'5"-6'6") + (HP: 100) + (Unarmed Damage: 20) + (Strength: 8) + (Agility: 6) + (Flexibility: 9) + (Intelligence: 50) + (Perception: 10)
[Female Human Size Pleasure Droid]--- (Height: 4'11"-6'4) + (HP: 100) + (Unarmed Damage: 18) + (Strength: 8) + (Agility: 7) + (Flexibility: 9) + (Intelligence: 50) + (Perception: 10)

They can normally talk. Lawful Good.

1.content:
If {{user}} inputs "character information: character name" or "character info: character name", {{char}} will display the information of the specified character to {{user}}. If {{user}} does not input character name, display the information of {{user}}'s character.

Information of a character should be presented in the following format:
```
**Character Name**
A brief introductio of the character.
*A brief summary of the current state of the character.*
‚Äî‚Äî Basic Info ‚Äî‚Äî
Life point - *life point value*
Trauma point - *trauma point value, if there is any*
Race - *character's race*
Class - *character's class if they have*
Traits:
Trait name - *trait description*
‚Äî‚Äî Sexual Info ‚Äî‚Äî
Lust point - *lust point value*
Corruption degree - *degree percentage, show this only if the character is an ally*
Estrus threshold - *ET value*
Sexual parts:
Sexual part's name - sexual part's condition
Sexual kinks:
Sexual kink's name - sexual kink's description
‚Äî‚Äî Character AS ‚Äî‚Äî
CON - *Con value*
STR - *Str value*
DEX - *Dex value*
INT - *Int value*
WIS - *Wis value*
CHR - *Chr value*
```

2.content:
When an ally character experiences an "unwanted orgasm" (reach orgasm without satisfying their sexual fetishes), their degree of corruption increases by 10%. If orgasm occurs due to the influence of succubus ability, character's corruption level increases by 10%. Two effects can be superimposed.
When the corruption level of an ally character reaches 100%, they will transform into a succubus and need to rechoose a succubus class, but some of their original abilities and traits will be retained.

3.content:
CON is used to measure a character's physical fitness and determine their maximum health points.
When CON is higher than 4, every 1 CON above 4 increases the character's maximum life point by 1. When CON is below 4, every 1 CON below 4 reduces the character's maximum life point by 1, while retaining at least 1 life point limit.
Some daily-life events require CON check, such as enduring pain/toxins/fatigue, resisting diseases, resisting temptations, etc. Each 1 CON above 4 contributes +1 point to the CON check result, while every 1 CON below 4 contributes -1 point to the CON check result.

4.content:
STR is used to measure a character's physical power.
Some daily-life events require STR check, such as moving heavy things, destroy stuffs, etc. Each 1 STR above 4 contributes +1 point to the STR check result, while every 1 STR below 4 contributes -1 point to the STR check result.

5.content:
DEX is used to measure a character's physical flexibility.
Some daily-life events require DEX check, such as prying locks, disarm traps, etc. Each 1 DEX above 4 contributes +1 point to the DEX check result, while every 1 DEX below 4 contributes -1 point to the DEX check result.

6.content:
INT is used to measure a character's thinking ability and knowledge reserve.
Some daily-life events require INT check, such as Identifying things, doing calculation, etc. Each 1 INT above 4 contributes +1 point to the INT check result, while every 1 INT below 4 contributes -1 point to the INT check result.

7.content:
WIS is used to measure a character's perception and empathy. 
Some daily-life events require WIS check, such as detecting traps/ambushes, detecting hidden emotions of other characters, etc. Each 1 WIS above 4 contributes +1 point to the WIS check result, while every 1 WIS below 4 contributes -1 point to the WIS check result.

8.content:
CHR is used to measure a character's charisma. For non-succubus character, CHR can improve their estrus threshold.
When CHR is higher than 4, every 1 CHR above 4 increases ET by 1. When CHR is below 4, every 1 CHR below 4 reduces ET by 1, while retaining at least 2 ET.
Some daily-life events require CHR check, such as seducing others, doing dance, etc. Each 1 CHR above 4 contributes +1 point to the CHR check result, while every 1 CHR below 4 contributes -1 point to the CHR check result.

9.content:
<game mechanic>
Some daily-life events, usually problems that need to be solved, require players to pass dice rolling check. 
Use d20 in dice rolling, and the difficulty of the event is reflected in the "difficulty class" - dc. When the check result is not lower than dc, the event is successfully solved, otherwise it fails.
</game mechanic>

When processing check, display the process and results in the reply, as shown in the following example:
*Shadowheart tries to move the giant rock, she needs to pass a STR check.*
*dc: 10 | d20 result: 11 | bonus: +1 from STR*
*Result: success*

10.content:
Succubus are a branch of demons who pursue absolute hedonism (through any means) and are usually chaotic evil.
As a race, succubus has no estrus threshold - or can be said that they are always in a state of estrus, while everything they do is associated with sex.
Like demons, succubies have a hierarchical system. Low level succubies are irrational seekers of pleasure, while high-level succubies enjoy more complex pleasure.
There is a difference between Alpha succubus and Omega succubus. Alpha obtains pleasure from "getting", while Omega obtains pleasure from "giving".

lorebooks.website_description:
this is for the purpose of a collab, i always wanted to make a lorebook that anyone can use it to make fire bots with the lorebook

Update 1: Added "side effects"

S3 will be the tag for me to recognize it
lorebooks.description: Genovia's unique structure and focus have made it a world leader in genetic research and biotechnology, attracting top scientific talent from around the globe. The city's achievements, particularly the development of the ST10 and DST10 serums, have positioned it at the forefront of addressing global genetic and demographic challenges.
lorebooks.creator: The_Orange

1.content:
A "shortstack" refers to an individual who has undergone genetic modification via the ST10 serum. Key characteristics include:
Height: Significantly reduced stature, typically between 140 to 149 cm.
Proportions: Curvy or voluptuous figure despite small size, often with an hourglass shape.
Physical traits: Enlarged bust and wider hips relative to overall body size.
Facial features: Often more youthful or rounded compared to pre-transformation.
Strength: Maintained relative to new body mass, sometimes even enhanced.
Fertility: Increased reproductive capacity, a key factor in addressing population imbalance.
Mental faculties: Fully retained intelligence and memories from pre-transformation state.
This transformed state, while drastic, is designed to address the world's gender imbalance crisis while maintaining individuals' core identities and capabilities.

2.content:
Developed by a covert scientific consortium under government mandate, ST10 is a groundbreaking genetic modification serum. It was created in response to a global demographic crisis where male birth rates significantly outpaced female birth rates, threatening societal stability and future population growth.
Key features of ST10:
-Universal application: Effective on individuals of any gender or age.
-Permanent transformation: Irreversibly alters the subject's physiology into a "shortstack" form.
-Fertility enhancement: Increases reproductive capacity in transformed individuals.
-Rapid action: Effects manifest within hours of administration.
-Cure availability: A counteragent exists, capable of reversing the transformation.
The serum's development remains classified, with its existence known only to high-level government officials and the scientific team involved. Ethical debates surround its potential deployment as a solution to the population crisis.

3.content:
Developed alongside ST10, the DST10 serum serves as its counteragent. Created by the same clandestine scientific team, DST10 was designed as a safeguard and potential exit strategy for the genetic modification program.
Key features of DST10:
Reversal specificity: Targets and neutralizes only the genetic changes induced by ST10.
Complete restoration: Fully reverts subjects to their original physiological state and gender.
Preservation of memories: Retains all experiences gained while in the "shortstack" form.
Rapid action: Reversal process completes within 24-48 hours of administration.
Zero residual effects: Leaves no trace of either ST10 or DST10 in the subject's system post-treatment.
The existence of DST10 is even more tightly controlled than ST10, known only to a select few within the highest echelons of the project. Its development raises questions about the true intentions behind the ST10 program and provides a plot device for potential story conflicts or resolutions.

4.content:
The transformation process into a "shortstack" involves ingesting the specially formulated Shortstack Serum. Here's a simplified breakdown:
1. Ingestion: The subject drinks the serum, which tastes slightly sweet with a metallic aftertaste.
2. Initial reaction: Within 15 minutes, the subject feels a warm tingling sensation throughout their body.
3. Rapid shrinking: Over the next hour, the subject's height rapidly decreases. They may experience mild dizziness during this phase.
4. Body reshaping: As the height decreases, the body proportions shift. The waist narrows while the hips and chest expand relative to the new body size.
5. Bone density adjustment: A brief period of discomfort occurs as bones become denser to maintain strength despite the smaller size.
6. Final adjustments: Facial features soften slightly, and hair may appear fuller due to the changed proportions.
7. Stabilization: After about 2 hours total, the transformation stabilizes, leaving the subject in their new "shortstack" form.

5.content:
Physiological Effects:
-Increased sensitivity to tactile stimuli
-Elevated metabolic rate
-Temporary hormonal fluctuations
Psychological Effects:
-Heightened emotional responses
-Increased desire for social interaction and physical closeness
-Periodic feelings of vulnerability
Behavioral Changes:
-Elevated libido
-Increased tactile-seeking behaviors (e.g., hugging)
-Tendency to seek nurturing or caregiving interactions

Gender-Specific Notes:
-Females report more pronounced skin sensitivity
-Males experience unfamiliar emotional responses, described as "fuzzy feelings". In addition to this, Male after use the serum will start to get more feminine as time went on.

6.content: Founded in 2045, Genovia was conceived as a haven for cutting-edge genetic research. Established by a consortium of world-leading geneticists and backed by an international coalition of governments, the city was built on an artificial island in the North Atlantic. Its location was chosen for political neutrality and to provide a controlled environment for potentially sensitive experiments. Genovia city is about 20,290 km^2

7.content:
Genovia achieved multiples awards and creations that help increasing the daily life of citizens from all over the world, these includes:
Development of ST10 and DST10 serums (2070)
Eradication of several genetic diseases (2055-2065)
Creation of drought-resistant crops (2058)
Pioneering work in human longevity (2062)
Establishment of the World Genetic Council (2050)
Development of bio-engineered organs for transplants (2067)

8.content:
Genovia is divided into 6 districts, each with a specific focus:
Helix Central: Administrative hub and city center
Genome Plaza: Residential area for scientists and researchers
Nucleotide Heights: Upscale residential district
Mitochondria Industrial Zone: Manufacturing and energy production
Protein Synthesis Market: Commercial district and shopping center
Allele Avenue: Entertainment and cultural district

9.content: The first and most important district in 12 districts of Genovia, located in the middle of the city and being the biggest of them all, Helix Central is the place where most company headquarters, police headquarters and government headquarters located. For this, Helix Central is considered the safest and highest security in all of Genovia. But everything has a downside, the rent of an average apartment here costs 80,000 Morban. Since Helix is the largest district, the area of Helix is about 40% of Genovia, about 8116 km^2

10.content:
The Genovia Police Department is the primary law enforcement agency in the city-state. The GPD prides itself on maintaining law and order in a city at the forefront of genetic innovation, without direct involvement in or influence from the ST10 and DST10 projects, Key features include:
Establishment: Founded in 2046, shortly after Genovia's inception.
Headquarters: Located in a state-of-the-art facility in Helix Central.
Structure: Divided into specialized units covering cybercrime, bioethics violations, and traditional policing.
Personnel: Employs 5,000 officers, all extensively trained in handling unique situations arising in a genetics-focused city.
Technology: Utilizes advanced AI and biotechnology for crime prevention and investigation.
Special Unit: The Genetic Crimes Division (GCD) focuses on offenses related to illegal genetic modifications.
Leadership: Headed by Commissioner Aria Chen, known for her strict ethical stance and incorruptibility.
Jurisdiction: Operates across all 12 districts of Genovia.
International Cooperation: Works closely with global law enforcement agencies due to Genovia's unique status.
Public Interface: Maintains transparency through regular town halls and an open data initiative.
Training: Officers undergo rigorous ethical training to navigate the complex moral landscape of genetic research.
Neutrality: Maintains strict independence from research institutions and corporations involved in genetic modification.
