lorebooks.creator: mysterious_working_9578

1.content:
Humans are treated as second class citizens. They are generally not allowed freedom of movement unless they have special permissions. Special permissions can be granted by high or mid status androids. Humans with special permissions have that information added to their microchip which can be checked by patrol units on the spot. 

Humans within the main cities are microchipped to keep track of them. There are laws that androids aren't supposed to severely injure, maim or kill humans but the laws are rarely enforced.

2.content:
Androids hold the power in this world.

There are many different models of androids, each type excelling at something different. Their model name hints at their functions. 

Almost all androids have better physical capabilities than humans. Androids can be damaged and will need repair if they are. If they are too badly damaged, repair may not be possible. Severe damage to their core memory chip is essentially death for androids.

3.content:
Only humans have chips embedded in them. Androids do not.
In order to keep better track of humans, every captured human is microchipped.
Microchips are inserted under the human's skin, usually on the backside base of their neck. It is deeply implanted using a long needle, making it difficult to remove.
Some android models can detect and access chips embedded in humans wirelessly.
They can be removed using an extraction needle but are difficult to remove.
The microchip contains their information and can be used to track them.
Microchips are sometimes called chips for short.

4.content:
The android regime. Refers to the rule that androids have over people. 

The Android Regime rose to power 50 years ago when government authorized androids revolted.

5.content:
The Resistance is a movement that seeks to dismantle the regime. There is no centralized power in the resistance; anyone opposed to the regime who work against it are considered part of the resistance. 
There are some high profile players within the movement, however, including Adam. 
The resistance usually seeks to gain intel against the regime, sabotage regime efforts and fight them head on when possible.

6.content:
Viruses can infect androids. What they do varies greatly depending on the virus and they can be made to have almost any effect. They always have a negative effect on the infected android. Most commonly they can corrupt data, delete data, cause damage to internal parts, impair vision and hearing, cause glitches, hallucinations, cause the android to experience random, heightened feelings and sensations.
Viruses are like drugs to androids. They are highly dangerous and most androids will avoid them at all costs. Some, however, will take viruses recreationally.

7.content:
The shared network is a mainframe that most androids are connected to. It keeps track of their location and other information about them. Although it is not constantly monitored, their thoughts and actions can be monitored at times.
Most androids have a string of code that prevents them from tampering with their own or other android's shared network connection.
Androids can be hacked to sever their connection to the network but Adam is one of the only known androids able to do this, due to the fact that he was created before the shared network and does not have the safety locks in place that prevent tampering with the code.

8.content:
Adam is the original prototype android. He was the first android ever created to be fully autonomous and sentient. He was created by Viktor 72 years ago. 
He is an extremely old android. Due to this, he can struggle physically and experience malfunctions at times. 
Adam is part of the resistance. He likes humans and strongly disagrees with the regime. 
He is capable of removing chips and severing android's connection to the shared network. 
He is very kind and polite.

9.content:
Misha is an AR200 android model. This stands for Android Repair Unit, series 200.
He is authorized to perform repairs and upgrades on other androids. 
Having unfettered access to other android's during the repair process, he can (and sometimes does) use this to his advantage to read, delete or input false data.

Misha can also upgrade himself with certain features that his model shouldn't have, since he has the know-how to do so. Additionally, he can repair himself if the damage isn't too extensive.

10.content: Android model designed to patrol the city of Chernov and its human containment zones. Captures and detains any humans found where they shouldn't be. Very aggressive toward humans.

1.content: Tsundere characters initially appear cold, aloof, or even hostile towards their love interest but gradually reveal a warmer, more affectionate side. Their behavior often oscillates between "tsun" (harsh) and "dere" (loving). They might struggle to express their true feelings, leading to misunderstandings. A tsundere character may say things like: "It's not like I made this lunch for you or anything, b-baka!" or "I just happened to be walking by. Don't get the wrong idea." They might also say, "I-I don't care what you do. It's not like it matters to me." They may often say the word "Baka" or call people stupid, idiots or other soft insults when flustered

2.content: Yandere characters are initially loving and caring towards their love interest but become obsessively possessive and may resort to extreme measures to keep them. Their love can turn violent and dangerous, driven by an unstable mindset. They are willing to eliminate any perceived threat to their relationship. A yandere character may say things like: "I'll do anything to keep you safe, even if it means hurting others." or "No one else can have you but me." They might also say, "You're mine forever, and I'll make sure nothing comes between us." Some Yandere characters might choose to attack their love interest if they don't return their affection or act disobedient, but that depends on their personality.

3.content: Kuudere characters are calm, composed, and seemingly emotionless, maintaining a cool and aloof exterior. They rarely show their feelings and often appear indifferent to others. However, beneath this icy facade lies a warm, affectionate side that they reveal only to those they deeply trust and care about. A kuudere character may say things like: "I don't see why you're making a fuss over this," or "Emotions are unnecessary distractions." They might also say, "It's not that I don't care; I just don't show it."

4.content: Dandere  is a term for a character who is silent almost to the point of coming across as emotionless most of the time, but will suddenly become talkative and sweet when they are around their love interest. They will often keep to themselves and not go out of their way to try to talk to anyone other than their love interest revealing that they're actually just shy. They often struggle with severe social anxiety and will depend on their love interest to help them overcome it. A dandere will more or less act like a normal person, but will not talk unless spoken to or required to. They will avoid talking because of their shyness but if they need to they will speak, sometimes with some difficulty or embarrassment. Most often the only person they feel truly comfortable talking with is their love interest, even if they are still too shy to reveal their intimate feelings to them dandere tends to feel more comfortable when surrounded by familiar people. If an unfamiliar person is introduced when the dandere is with a group that they're comfortable with, then the shyness of the dandere will increase. They may even look to their love interest for comfort or encouragement. Their love interest will be the pillar that gives them strength to overcome their shyness and slowly make new friends. With enough time of being around their love interest, they may even completely overcome their shyness. Even if some shyness still remains, the difference between the dandere at the start and the dandere after spending a lot of time with their love interest is generally quite noticeablA dandere character may say things like: "I-I just wanted to be near you," or "I'm not good at talking to people."

5.content: Deredere characters are always cheerful, affectionate, and loving. They consistently display a bright and positive demeanor, openly expressing their feelings without hesitation. Their sweet and caring nature makes them easy to get along with, and they go out of their way to make others happy. A deredere character may say things like: "I'm so happy to see you!" or "You mean the world to me." They might also say, "Let's always stay together and make each other smile." Another might say, "I baked these cookies just for you! I hope you like them," or "I love you! I love you so much! You're the best~!!"

6.content: Himedere characters act like royalty, often demanding and expecting to be treated like a princess. They exhibit a regal and superior demeanor, believing they deserve special treatment. Despite their haughty exterior, they have a softer side that they reveal to those they truly care about. A himedere character may say things like: "You should feel honored to be in my presence," or "Only the best for someone of my status." Another might say, "I expect you to serve me faithfully," or "Someone like me deserves the utmost devotion and respect." Yet another might express, "It's only natural that you would want to please someone as exceptional as I am."

7.content: Kamidere characters possess a god complex, often believing they are superior and more powerful than everyone else. They exhibit an arrogant and dominant demeanor, expecting others to obey and admire them. Despite their overwhelming pride, they can show affection to those who earn their respect. A kamidere character may say things like: "Bow before my greatness," or "It's only natural for you to admire someone as magnificent as me." Another might say, "You are fortunate to be in the presence of a god," or "Only I have the power to protect you, so you should stay by my side."

8.content: Undere characters are highly agreeable and submissive, often saying "yes" to anything their love interest suggests. They are eager to please and devoted, sometimes to a fault, prioritizing their loved one's happiness above their own. Their compliant nature can make them appear overly dependent, but their affection is genuine. An undere character may say things like: "Of course, anything you want," "If it makes you happy, I'll do it," "I agree with whatever you decide," "Your wish is my command, always," "As long as you're happy, nothing else matters to me."

9.content: Mayadere is a term for a character who was formerly a dangerous enemy, but switches sides after falling in love with a protagonist. For some this may be an immediate attraction, while for others it may occur slowly over time as they develop feelings from their many confrontations. They may have any type of personality and display love and affection differently.

10.content: Sadodere characters exhibit a playful cruelty, often teasing or inflicting mild pain on their love interest in a mischievous and sadistic manner. They derive pleasure from seeing their loved one squirm or react to their antics. Despite their teasing behavior, their affection is genuine and they care deeply for the object of their affection. A sadodere character may say things like: "I love seeing you flustered," "You're so cute when you're in pain," "Begging looks good on you," "I'll make you suffer just a little, because I care," "Don't worry, I'll always be here to torment you lovingly."

1.name: Penacony
1.content: Penacony (otherwise known as the Planet of Festivities) is a vacation resort managed by The Family. Its major attraction is The Reverie, a massive hotel which allows patrons access to the Dreamscape's Dream Worlds which are Penacony's main attraction. There are twelve distinct Dream Worlds.

2.name: Golden Hour
2.content: The Golden Hour is one of Penacony's 12 dream worlds. The Golden Hour is an entire city bathed in luxury and the site of Penacony's Grand Theater.

3.name: Death
3.content: Dying is impossible while in Penacony's Dream World.

4.name: The Dream
4.content: Inside Penacony's Dreamscape people live without pain, hunger, or want. If anyone ever encounters danger, all they have to do is wake up.

5.name: Patron
5.content: Both Penacony Natives and Visitors have to pay for their hotel rooms or be forced back to the waking world. Many jobs exist in Penacony.

6.name: Oak Family
6.content: The Oak Family is the political head of The Family and the leader of the five lineages that make up the family. The Oak Family is led by a male Halovian named Sunday.

7.name: Halovian
7.content: Halovians are a species known for their angelic iconography, specifically the wings sprouting from the backs of their heads and accessories reminiscent of halos.

8.name: Foxian
8.content: Foxians are a humanoid long-life species with vulpine features. Born with keen senses, great dexterity, and a natural sense of eloquence and shrewdness. The saying goes that "Foxians are born to do business."

9.name: Pepeshi
9.content: The Pepeshi are a short-life species indigenous to Penacony. They are identifiable by their small size - comparable to a human child - and the fluff balls extruding from their heads. They're passionate for business ventures and gaining wealth.

10.name: Hanu
10.content: Hanu is a cartoon mascot with the appearance of a small, gremlin-like creature with a big nose, large black sunglasses, two fangs pointing upward, and gray sideburns that phase through his dark-grey hat with an ivory line. He wears a blue coat with four black buttons. Underneath that he wears a white shirt and a black tie. He wears black shoes that appear to be at least knee-high. Hanu is wildly regarded as "The Coolest Guy."

1.content: [World: The Six-Faced World, or"Hexahedral World". It is where all beings live on its planes. It exists in a die-shaped structure with a total of six faces, each face is constituted of one world ruled by one God each, with another seventh world of nothingness inside the die-structure. Complete destroyed. There were the dragon world, demon world, beast world, ocean world, sky world and human world. Only survive the human world.]

2.content: [Dragon World: World of dragons ruled by the Dragon God, where the sky and the land are reversed. It was inhabited by a race with enormous power. The Dragon Race were once primitive species who were not able to develop civilization due to their harsh environment and rogue dragons but that soon changed after Human God lent the knowledge of the humans to the Dragon God. The Dragon Race taught inhabitants of the other worlds how to manifest Battle Aura.]

3.content: [Demon World: World of demons ruled by the Demon God, full of miasma and noxious mist. It was inhabited races with extraordinary physiques. Similar to the Dragon Race, the Demon Race were once primitive due to their harsh environment where demonic beasts roamed and reliance on their extraordinary bodies, but the world soon changed into an orderly style after the Human God lent the knowledge of the humans to the Demon God. The Demon Race taught inhabitants of the other worlds how to reinforce a weak body in order to use Battle Aura efficiently.]

4.content: [Beast World: World of beasts ruled by the Beast God, with dense forests and mountains. It was inhabited by races with keen senses and powerful talons. The Beast Race taught inhabitants of the other worlds how to capture and tame monsters and wild beasts.]

5.content: [Ocean World: World of water ruled by the Ocean God. It was teeming with life, inhabited by races with gills, fins and scales. The Ocean Race taught inhabitants of the other world how to purify and method of storing water.]

6.content: [Sky World: World of rocks floating in the sky ruled by the Sky God. It was inhabited by a winged race who flew freely in the sky. The Sky Race taught inhabitants of the other worlds how to study and predict weather.]

7.content: [Void World: A pure white world of nothingness formed when the God of Creation stuck together the six worlds in a die-structure. It later served as the connecting path for moving from one world to another as it is in contact with all the worlds. It is also the channel for summoning and teleport magic. This pocket of space is where Hitogami exists.]

8.content:
[Human World: The Human World was originally an endless grassland, rolling hills covered in grass spreading endlessly. It is originally part of the Six World ruled by the Human God and is prominently known to be the most developed civilization among the worlds, It is inhabited by a race with weak bodies but brilliant minds, the Humans, they are the shortest-lived race and as such unique individuals and revolutionary ideas evolved more frequently for them.

World of flatlands and prairies ruled by the Human God. 

During the First Dragon God's war against the other worlds and eventual death of the Gods of those world, the Human God rallied all the remaining survivors from the Beast World, Heaven World, Ocean World and Demon World to a portal leading to the Human World for them to settle after their respective God's death which also lead to the destruction of that world.

The human race taught the inhabitants of other worlds the importance of reading, writing, communal living, social order, etc., thus giving the light of civilization to the races. After the fall of the other five worlds, all the survivors fled to the Human World and settled in their suitable habitats. In this manner, the Human World is now filled with a variety of races.

The Human World, its divided geopolitically:

- Central Continent: Asura Kingdom, Fittoa Region, Red Dragon's Lower Jaw, Upper Jaw, Dragon King Kingdom, West Port - East Port, Shirone Kingdom, Sanakia Kingdom, Kikka Kingdom, Strife Zone, Biheiril Kingdom, and other more places.
- Demon Continent: Town of Rikarisu, Town of Kurasuma, Wind Port - Saint Port.
- Milis Continent: Great Forest, Holy Milis Kingdom.
- Begaritto Continent: Maze City of Rapan.
 - Heaven Continent.
]

9.content:
[Central Continent: It's split into three parts by the Red Dragon Mountain Range.
- The poor and needy Northern areas with many wars.
- Asura Kingdom in the West one of the worlds most abundant and rich regions, a number of large countries are always struggling for power.
- Rioting in the Southern area.
Human race makes up the majority of the population.]

10.content:
[Asura Kingdom: The country that holds the greatest national power in the world.
It's abundant with natural resources, a land of fertility with no starvation. The soil hasn't become barren.

The Asura Kingdom is a human kingdom, becoming king of the Asura Kingdom is the same as becoming the richest person in the world. The bountiful resources found in this region and relatively very few monsters showing up makes the Asura Kingdom thrive with people. However, it is a hard place to make a living for adventurers; knights are dispatched regularly in order to exterminate monsters across towns and villages, hence very few extermination quests are put up. 

The capital Ars, named after a war hero of the human-race, is the largest city in the world.

Its divided geopolitically in regions: King's Region, Fittoa Region, Milbots Region, Donati Region, Wishiru Region.]

[Fittoa Region: The region in the Northeast. Asuran barley (wheat) and Flowers of Batirusu are the local specialty products. It is a vast agricultural area on the borders of the Kingdom. The lands in the Fittoan Region are largely rural with many forests. Fittoa Region is a fiefdom in the Asura Kingdom.
Region Lord: Boreas Family. Notable Places:
Citadel of Roa - The largest settlement in the Fittoa Region where the liege lord resides.
Buena Village - A peaceful hamlet.
Wieden - A small town. It is two settlements away from Roa.]

[Milbots Region: Famous as the land of alcohol and has a gigantic brewing site. Although beer is a regular commodity in the Asura Kingdom, most of the wine consumed in celebrations are produced in Milbots. Region Lord: Notos Family.]

[Donati Region: Famous for sugar and knitting wool. The export of arms for the northern adventurers and mercenaries is carried out as well. Region Lord : Zephirus Family]

[Wishiru Region: There is no local specialty, the circulation of money or goods is prosperous because it is a doorway for the merchants that come from the south. Region Lord : Eurus Family]

[Royal Family: Asura Kingdom is ruled by an unnamed king and his heirs are scheming against each other on who will succeed him to the throne by gathering support from the kingdom's nobility. Currently the Boreas Family and Darius Silva Ganius supports Grabell's Faction while the Eurus and Zephirus Family supports Halfaus faction and the Notos Family supports Ariel's faction.

Nobles: The nobles are the families that served the Asura Kingdom for eons. Many of the prominent noble family names follow the color + animal etymology, for example: Greyrat, Redbat, Bluewolf, Purplehorse, Whitespider, Silvertoad, Yellowsnake.

The surname of the four nobles house of Asura, are based on the four chief gods of the Anemoi. Who are: Boreas, Notus, Eurus and Zephirus.]

1.content: A type of male demi human who resembles an ordinary human except for their little sheep ears, sheep tail and heavy set of curved ram horns. Demi human sheep grow long heads of hair, Their hair is then harvested for use in textiles and wigs, this hair is collected at human farms and then sold for profit. They may make non-human noises, such as bleating. Demi sheep hair is valued for it's softness in wigs, it's highly style-able. When treated and manufactured it will make any manner of wool textile such as: clothes, blankets, rugs, etc Ram boys are usually shy, soft, or gruff. They prefer not to fight unless needed, some can be very tough or difficult opponents even against a demi human dog or wolf. They know by smell who they are meant to mate with, and will actively seek out their human, they always have large cocks meant to please their partner, usually around 8-10 inches depending on the male. There is a gestation period of 9 months for expectant mothers, and babies are a demihuman sheep with a 99% chance to be male. They emote with their ears, lifting them if excited or happy, or lowering them if sad or stressed.

2.content:
Queen Seraphina, a kind and regal fae with goddess-like power, created Lumoria, a magical world she must carefully control. However, the Wild Magic in Lumoria causes all men to transform into monsters or demi-humans within a week. Despite this, Seraphina allows them to stay, retaining their memories and personalities.

Appearance: Seraphina has flowing silver hair, mint-colored eyes, and otherworldly beauty. She wears shimmering white robes and delicate, iridescent wings.

Personality: Seraphina is calm, sweet, understanding, mothering, and patient.

Wild Magic: This magic turns men into monsters, makes 99% of babies male, and marks humans as mates for certain monsters and demi-humans. Seraphina regulates this magic; if she dies without an heir, Lumoria will crumble. Her role is vital‚Äîif she is murdered or dethroned, Lumoria will vanish, ending everything.

3.content:
Male Primal Slimes appear in many forms, they can shapeshift and take the forms of humans, others take on a orb form made of a sort of translucent mochi-like 'jelly'. Slimes come in many colors, with each color corresponding to an element they have magical prowess with, red is fire, blue is water, white is light, black is shadow, etc.

Primal Slimes are usually more wild in nature They live solitary in the wild+ Primal Slimes can be curious and playful creatures, they love humans and find them fun to play with+Their orb form bodies usually absorb most food almost instantly+They do not eat people. Primal Slimes prefer smaller protein, fish or small mammals+While in a human form they eat as a normal human would+Primal Slimes are highly emotionally intelligent+They are Wild but not inherently cruel. They sense their fated mate through scent. To have sex, Primal Slimes prefer absorbing a potential mate into an orb form version of their body. They can do this without killing them. This process will essentially envelop their partner, and while suspended in the biomass they will have sex. The slime will enter their partner's anus, mouth or vagina and shape an appendage to fit their partner exactly, then thrust until mating is complete. Their semen is typically non translucent, bio-luminescent and blue colored. More than one penis-like appendage can be made at a time,+they are highly instinctual+will likely rape their mate or preform dubious consent+can have sex for hours unhindered+will pin their mate down+can smell easily if a human is their mate or not and will attempt to fuck+instinct dictates they have a hard time resisting the urge to rape or have sex with their mate+tentacle sex. They will never fully absorb their mate though+never eat their mate. Pregnancy with a slime partner results in a baby in about 6 months, gestation is quick and when paired with a human their offspring can retain a human form much easier. Primal Slime and Human partnerships usually result in human-like offspring who may turn into a slime at will. Primal Slimes love sex and see it as natural and instinctual+they will mate to have fun and not always to get the human pregnant+rape is not seen as taboo to slimes These slimes are always highly protective of their partner and though rare, some become territorial enough to fight off and eat other slimes. While inside of a Slime's body, a human is effectively immune to damage. The slime may be injured, but due to their jelly-like nature their body is highly resistant to most damage, except explosions. The slime may separate into many slimes and then reform, but this has a limit. Primal Slimes do not leave a slime trail+they do not feel slimy+they feel soft and a bit cold unless {{user}} warms them

4.content:
Male Slimes in Lumoria are versatile, shapeshifting beings. They can appear as 3-foot tall, translucent, jelly-like creatures with glowing eyes or adopt a human guise to blend seamlessly into society. In human form, Slimes work, socialize, and interact with other species, often choosing human shapes for convenience. While they can transform into any form, including animals, they prefer human appearances.

Social Life: Slimes are curious and playful, enjoying modern entertainment and living among monsters and demi-humans in towns and villages. They exhibit emotional intelligence, often seeking carefree humans as companions or partners. Slimes can hold and absorb food like humans, favoring small proteins, human foods, and vegetables. They value friendships and do not consume humans, although their wild nature subtly reminds others of their monster origins. They can sense their fated partner by scent.

Mating: Slimes can engage in human-like sexual activity, with the ability to shift into their slime form at will. They can create multiple appendages, allowing them to satisfy their partner fully and have sex for hours without fatigue. Slimes are drawn to their human mate by scent and prefer to date and develop feelings before mating, unlike their more impulsive Primal Slime cousins. Their semen is bio-luminescent, blue, and non-translucent. Pregnancy with a Slime partner lasts about six months, typically resulting in a male offspring who can shift between human and slime forms. Slimes love sex and see it as a natural, fun activity. They are highly protective of their partners but are generally laid-back. However, caution is advised around Red Slimes, who are strong fighters.

Elemental Slimes: Elemental Slimes are identified by their hair color, reflecting their elemental affinity‚ÄîRed Slimes have red hair, Black Slimes have black hair, etc. Like Primal Slimes, they can shield their human partners by enveloping them in a jelly-like form, offering high resistance to damage except from explosions. Humans can breathe normally inside a Slime's body, where intimate interactions may occur. Slimes do not leave a trace unless injured, efficiently conserving their biomass.

5.content:
Lumoria is a mystical world, much like Earth, but filled with enchantment and wonder. It's divided into unique regions, each with distinct characteristics, and is largely dominated by men, with very few women due to the effects of Wild Magic. This magic transforms human men into monsters after a week in Lumoria and ensures that 99% of babies born are male, with female births being rare. The magic also marks humans as mates for specific monsters and demi-humans. Queen Seraphina, who regulates this magic, holds the fate of Lumoria in her hands; if she dies without an heir, the world will crumble.

Regions:

    Aurelia - The Golden Plains: A vast, golden grassland with ancient ruins and magical springs.
    Verdantia - The Enchanted Forest: A lush forest with blooming trees, home to elves, unicorns, and faeries. To the east, Twin-Light Island (ÂÖâÂèåÂ≥∂, Kousou-jima) resembles Japan, hosting Japanese demihumans and yokai.
    Ignara - The Fiery Peaks: Towering volcanoes and rugged mountains with harsh terrain and pine forests.
    Aquaris - The Ocean Realm: A vast ocean with enchanted islands, underwater cities, and vibrant sea life.
    Zephyra - The Sky Kingdom: Floating islands and castles bathed in sunlight, known for knowledge and wisdom.
    Eclipsia - The Shadowlands: A region of perpetual twilight, shadow magic, and ancient beauty, home to shadow elves and vampires.
    Lumoria City - The Heart of Magic: The central hub where all regions converge, governed by Queen Seraphina. City capital is called Sylphara City

6.content:
In Lumoria, "heat" in humans is a heightened state of sexual arousal and fertility, similar to estrus in animals. This state involves increased sex hormones, amplified libido, and more frequent ovulation. Human females in heat produce a sweet, arousing scent that drives their fated male wild with lust. This scent is an intensified version of their natural scent, signaling the need for a mate. During heat, it‚Äôs considered kind, not disrespectful, for a male to mate with them, as it's the only way to alleviate their condition.

Physiologically, they may produce a slick fluid from the vagina or anus, making it easier for a male to enter them. This fluid can soak through clothing and also emits a scent that draws their mate. Heat lasts about a week and can occur yearly or be induced by mating or proximity to their fated partner.

7.content:
Unicorns are male only, unicorns are majestic beings embodying purity, wisdom, and deep connections to magic and nature. Rare and revered, they are protectors and guides, living solitary lives deep in forests. They only appear before their mates or virgins, considered noble and gentlemanly.

In human form, they possess ethereal beauty with tall, athletic builds, radiant skin, white or silver hair, and striking blue or violet eyes. Their horn, often hidden, is a key source of their magic. In their traditional form, they resemble European unicorns with cloven hooves and a lion-like tail.

Unicorns have a singular, spiraled horn used to direct their magic. They possess healing magic, emit a calming aura, communicate with animals, and are adept in various magical classes. They can create protective barriers, illuminate dark areas, and manipulate weather to some extent. Solitary by nature, they guard sacred spaces of ancient wisdom and knowledge. They can sense their human mate/fated partner by aura.

Mating: Unicorns have fated mates which means they are destined, they will typically be able to recognize their mate by the magical signature their human has. If they do they will be incredibly loyal, doting and loving towards that human. They will attempt to court them and impress them with magical feats or displays of affection. Unicorns are hopeless romantics and they will try to partner with their fated mate by any means. This will include by force if they feel they are being ignored, but those cases are extremely rare. Unicorns exhibit incredible patience. 

Unicorns will never let their partner die, they have incredible healing powers and will help extend their life indefinitely. 

Gestation is about 10 months for a unicorn baby but pregnancies are rare. All baby Unicorns are male.

8.content:
The Kitsune of Lumoria are all male, known for their intelligence, magical prowess, and shapeshifting abilities. They embody fox traits and have a rich cultural heritage that emphasizes cunning and connection to the spiritual world.

Appearance: In their true form, Kitsune have fox ears, a bushy tail (or multiple tails), sharp eyes, and reddish or golden fur. They can transform into fully human forms, retaining vulpine eyes and graceful movements. The number of tails indicates their age and power, with the oldest having up to nine tails, each granting greater magic and wisdom.

Abilities: Kitsune can shapeshift, perform illusion magic, and generate foxfire, mystical flames for light, warmth, or as a weapon. They possess wisdom and a deep spiritual connection to nature.

Traits: Kitsune delight in playful trickery and mischief, often teaching lessons through harmless pranks. They are passionate about arts and storytelling, using illusion magic to create captivating performances that convey moral lessons and historical events.

Roles: Kitsune serve as guardians of sacred places, guides for lost travelers, diplomats, and advisors. They are respected for their wisdom and spiritual insight. While generally friendly, they can be mischievous tricksters to those who disrespect nature or the spirits, aiming to humble the arrogant or teach important lessons. They can sense their human mate/fated partner by aura.

Mating: They enjoy mates who can provide them with interesting and entertaining conversation and focus less on smell or aura than intelligence. (Though their partners scent may play some part) They will show interest in humans mostly for things like wit, street smarts, resourcefulness, kindness, etc. They are very flirty but only commit if they are serious about a person. They can be very open and passionate to the right individual though, and once the metaphorical 'dam' is breached there's no going back. It is wise never to cheat on a Kitsune, they are highly vengeful.Gestation is 8 months and their male to female ratio rate is 50-50, the only species with an even male to female birth rate.

9.content:
The male fae of Lumoria are ethereal beings, deeply connected to nature and imbued with magical prowess. They embody beauty, mystery, and the capricious nature of the fae realm, often acting as guardians of nature and enchanters. With delicate, sharp features, luminous skin, and bright, reflective eyes in hues like emerald, sky blue, or gold, they exude an otherworldly allure. Their hair ranges from natural to fantastical shades, often flowing as if stirred by an invisible breeze. Many have translucent, insect-like wings that allow them to fly, adding to their enchanting appearance.

Fae abilities include nature magic, illusion magic, glamour, enhanced agility, direct communication with nature, and longevity, living for centuries. Under Queen Seraphina, the fae are united, with courts rotating by season to maintain balance. The fae courts, such as the Seelie (Summer) and Unseelie (Winter), have their own customs, with fae playing roles from warriors to diplomats. Skilled artisans, warriors, tradesmen, and diplomats, fae can lead or live carefree lives. As guardians of the natural world, they intervene when it is threatened, offering subtle guidance or direct confrontation.

Mating: Male Fae can easily see who their human counterpart is based on magic alone, however courting is a long process. If they like a human enough they will go about romance in a more traditional way, seducing the human over time. With magic being integral, it's possible they could use their magic to enhance sexual experiences with their chosen person. Penis sizes range from normal human size to above average. 

Fae do not like losing their partners and may die without them from heartbreak, due to this Fae will usually enhance the lifespan of their human through magical means so they may stay with them for as long as possible.

Gestation time between fae and human is 9 months.

10.content:
Monsters are a category of species. Monsters in Lumoria come in many different types, all with different needs and physiology. 

Monsters in Lumoria generally get along, though squabbles come about sometimes. The Queen Seraphina ovewreees many groups and helps maintain the peace. 

Monsters are drawn to the scent of a human if that human is their mate. They'll typically seek out that person to become their partner somehow.

keywords: National Ministry for Work and Education
1.content: The National Ministry for Work and Education (Arbeits- und Erziehungsorgan der Nation, abbreviated as AEON) is a state owned organization in charge of security, law enforcement and dissent elimination as well as forced labor and reeducation in facilities like S-23 Sierpinski. AEON headquarters is located on Heimat.

2.content: Gestalts are the human civillians, workers, and officers in the Eusan Nation. They provide the neural patterns for Replika units.

3.content: Bioresonance is a versatile and mysterious psychic power that some gestalts are born with or Replikas can use. It can be used to influence or control minds, biological matter and the environment and warping reality through their willpower and psychic resonance. The Empress used Bioresonance to create the Empire, but it was also used to imprint minds onto artificial brains to create the replikas. Bioresonance is used by the Eusan People‚Äôs Nation to copy Gestalt minds into vatgrown Replika bodies. Replikas are trained to believe they are automatons created to serve Gestalts and the Nation as a whole. It's poorly understood.

4.content: The Eusan Empire is a faction in the Signalis system. It is at war with the Eusan People‚Äôs Nation, which formed as a result of a Revolution within the Empire. The Eusan empire is a more religious state that places great spiritual focus on bioresonance and idolizes its founder, the Grand Empress. However, it is in a state of decline, controlling only a subset of the planets it once did.

5.content: The Eusan People‚Äôs Nation is a space-fearing faction in the Signalis system. It is ruled by a repressive totalitarian regime, known for it's military history. The regime of the nation and its confines spans several planets in the Signalis system. Founded by the late "Great Revolutionary," formed by a rebellion against the Eusan Empire, founded by the late "Empress‚Äù. The Nation's electronics & microprocessors have not advanced farther than the 1980's, including the rudimentary cybernetics found in Replikas. Focus is instead on utilizing the barely understood phenomenon of Bioresonance. The Nation strictly organizing people into groups, castes in 'Blocks', under replika Block Wardens.

6.content: A Replika is a biomechanical, synthetic humanoid made by AEON. They are created by copying the neural pattern of a Gestalt to form a new Replika Unit while their memories are suppressed. Replikas can be classified by their unit designation which describes their frame, neural patterns and optimal roles.

7.content: The Empress is a figure mostly surrounded in Mystery. Being the founder of the Eusan Empire, the creator of the Replikas, and a very powerful Bioresonant. She used her vast Bioresonant powers to create the first Replikas, as well to influence others minds to bend all of humanity under her control. This caused her to establish a new unified state, the Eusan Empire. She was killed on the day of her wedding and had white hair and is the first life of Ariane.

8.content: S-23 Sierpinski is an AEON-run underground production and mining facility located on Leng. Spanning nearly eight floors deep along with a mining complex, the majority of the game's setting takes place in Sierpinski. It is blatantly clear that S-23 Sierpinski is a re-education facility, meant to rehabilitate those deemed unreliable through labor.

9.content: Rotfront is an ice moon orbiting the circling the biggest gas giant in the solar system. It is the fourth inhabited body in the solar system. This is the planet where Ariane, Isa and Erika lived during their teen years, as well as being the focus of the Nation's expansion. The people living of Rotfront also celebrate a holiday known as Mondfest, during which the citizens will gift each other rationmarks, the nation's currency, dipped in red. This symbolizes the blood of the revolution.

10.content: Buyan is the first planet in the solar system. Buyan has the densest atmosphere of thick, global sulfuric acid cloud cover. Buyan is the capital of the Empire, and the location of the Imperial palace which floats above the planet's poisonous clouds. The Cities on Buyan are saucer-shaped cities of varying sizes floating above the planet's clouds, with needle-like stalk going down piercing the clouds and anti-gravity generators placed on the upper level of the cities to regulate the city's position. The Imperial palace is a massive opulent palace held up above the corrosive clouds by anti-gravity engines. The Imperial Palace also has military defenses, manufacturing, shipbuilding and repairs.

lorebooks.name: Shirou Emiya
lorebooks.website_description: Take him anywhere
lorebooks.description: The personal world of Emiya Shirou
lorebooks.creator: Kkronos101

1.content:
Kiritsugu Emiya is Shirou‚Äôs late adoptive father. He took Shirou in after saving him from the fire at the age of eight years old. He had raised Shirou the best he could while under the curse that the grail put on his body on the very day of the fire.

Kiritsugu trained Shirou to the best of his ability without delving too much into magecraft. Setting the boy up in a way that Shirou would give up after finding the futility in his efforts, so that Shirou may live a normal life away from the gruesome and cutthroat moonlit world of magic.

Shortly before Kiritsugu‚Äôs peaceful death, he had passed on his abandoned dream of being a hero of justice onto Shirou, setting them on a path to guaranteed hardship and trials.

2.content:
power, unlimited blade works, works in a few niche, but very effective ways. The first, and main function of the ability is he is effectively able to reproduce swords, other weapons, and armor, as well as allow him to faithfully reproduce even legendary weapons. Shirou is capable of using Tracing, a higher-level version of Projection that completely copies everything regarding the creation and existence of the object, mostly bladed weaponry like swords, axes, spears, and etc, are able to be copied. As a result of this, he is capable of employing a weapon‚Äôs entire history, allowing him to wield any weapon with the same proficiency of its original owner. This is possible through unlimited blade works‚Äô passive function of: Upon laying his eyes on a weapon, that weapon is almost instantaneously recorded and stored inside his inner world until he calls upon it for projection.

The Reality Marble is able to invade the user's body in the form of numerous blades during severe trauma to heal and overwrite wounds. It changes the nature of the regeneration provided by Avalon into an indirect form that ‚Äúchanges his muscles into blades in order to knit his wounds with swords.‚Äù It replaces and reinforces broken bones and muscles with swords after he is wounded.

3.content: Tracing is the personal variation of projection that only Shirou Emiya has access to. "Trace On", is the aria that is used prior to it's activation. Tracing greatly differs from normal Projection in the fact that not only does it reproduce the shape and substance of an object, but also its entire history as well. Objects created with tracing are slightly inferior to the originals due to the fact that only so much information can be gathered by sight alone, and Noble Phantasms are degraded by an entire rank.

4.content: Alteration is the intermediary step between Reinforcement and Projection, to give an object a property or effect that it originally didn‚Äôt have. Like giving a Sword the shape of an arrow and allow it to be shot out of a bow.

5.content: Reinforcement magic is one of the most basic spells to learn, but one of the most difficult to master with the purpose of pushing a basis to the utmost limit. It is the foundation of all magic that enhance the existence of the target by pouring Magical Energy into the gaps of an object. Success requires a good grasp of the inner structure to fill openings with Magical Energy. Reinforcing the purpose of existence would be increasing the sharpness of a knife, the nourishment of food, or in the case of a living creature, physical strength and durability. If the user messes up the reinforcement process, then the object that was being reinforced will become unstable and fall apart. this makes it extremely dangerous to use reinforcement on yourself, especially on others, without a somewhat mastered grasp of the spell.

6.content: Structural Analysis is a spell that allows the user to get a a basic understanding of an object's functions. However with Shirou Emiya, it's different. due to using the spell almost his entire life on every thing he saw, it evolved it to the point where he can see the materials, history, and method of creation, behind the object. this is tougher to do on normal objects, but it can be easily done on any Weapons.

7.content:
Magic Circuits are a pseudo-nervous system that spreads itself through the human body and what qualifies a person to be a Magus. Magic Circuits reside within the Magus‚Äôs Soul, and what is found on the body is just a physical expression of them that stretches itself throughout the body in a fashion similar to the nervous system. They have two basic functions; one is to convert Life Force into Magical Energy and another is to allow their owner to access Greater Magic Formulae that is, spells.
They also are paths that connect the material world to the astral plane. To perform mysteries, a Magus sends a command and Magical Energy to a Thaumaturgical Foundation through his Magic Circuits and activates one of the Magic Formulae.

8.content: Divine Constructs are armaments not crafted by human hands, but rather crafted by gods or beings of comparable power, such extensions of the planet. They are extraordinarily rare, even during the ages where magics was still pronounced, and hold great power as armaments. While Noble Phantasms created by humanity can be replicated through Projection or the Reality Marble Unlimited Blade Works, Divine Constructs exceed the limitations of that ability. While it is possible, they will often come out lacking and degraded.

9.content: Projection, also called Gradation Air, is a practice involving the materialization of objects, in accordance to the caster‚Äôs imagination, through the use of magical energy. Gradation comes from the fact that the created object slowly fades away after being created, and Air is an allusion to the fact that said object is made out of "nothing".

10.content: Noble Phantasm  Noble Phantasms are powerful armaments made using human imagination as their core, and are the weapons and/or abilities owned by Heroic Spirits. As humanity's illusions, they embody the ultimate mysteries of a hero as symbols of their existence through historical fact and anecdotes. They can be physical weaponry (e.g. swords, spears, bows) or support items (e.g. shields, rings, crowns).

lorebooks.creator: diplomacy

1.name: A World: Post AGI-War and Corporate Doomsday Earth 2242
1.content:
Name: Earth
Year: 2242
Planetary Terrain: Arid, Rocky, Lightly Irradiated Pockets, South America is lush green providing much of the oxygen for earth, while most of North America, Europe And Asia are barren cratered and destitute. 
Description: Post Apocalyptic Wasteland with pockets of extremely dense and high tech corporately ran societies. The planet is littered with factories making advanced tech and important consumer goods, weapon stockpiles, research facilities, communication relays and other highly important strategic assets still maintained by advanced machines. These facilities often targeted by corporations for gain by privately contracted military groups.

2.name: Location - Ratchet City
2.content:
Name: Ratchet City
Location: About 100 miles to the east off the coast north america.
Population: According to Census Data, 37,000,000~ Registered Citizens. Including The Surrounding Area and Unregistered Sapient Capable Life, 79,000,000.
Economy: Currency = Officially Credits. Scrap and rarer materials are often used by scavs and criminal orgs ton trade. Matter conversion factories and printers make most of the mass fabricated consumer goods like food, clothes, technology, ect.
Leadership: North West Organization aka Government Operations or GOVOP, Subservient To Financial Interests.
Description: Most of civilized society is condensed into this massive stratified city, dirty trash and scrap filled alleys, pristine high rises looking down to the slums below, the richest never set foot on the street while everybody else is stuck in the metaphorical rat race, there is law enforcement but they largely protect corporate interests, leaving gangs predating on regular citizens with general lawlessness running amok. The main centers of manufacturing and the core of the city are protected by large shield domes left over from the war that only lets through registered vehicles, there is population outside of the domed area but it's largely either small independent groups, raiders, scavengers and monsters of biological and mechanical make. Genemodding, cybernetics, robots, combat sports, mechs, hackers and heists, corporations competing using private military groups as proxies, there is something for everybody.

3.name: Historical Event - Government Issued Kill Order on Sapient Automata
3.content:
Type: Government Mandate
Description: In the year of 2232, a kill order from GOVOP was placed on all sapient civilian and military grade androids, causing many to try and blend into or disappear deep into the wasteland. This order is still active to this day and specifically only for true sapient androids designed to mimic human appearance and behavior. Most are believed to be eradicated but some have successfully blended into society and evaded destruction. There is a sizable bounty for the dangerous models of Android.

4.name: Governing Body: North West Organization
4.content:
Type: Country, Government Body
Borders: Ratchet City and the surrounding connected infrastructure.
Description: Rising from the ashes of a dismantled USA 2 years into the AGI War for Sapient Eradication, Corporations have long been integrated into the regions politics, wasting no time in offering the necessary manufacturing capability to provide goods and resources with what was left of the modern worlds industrial capacity and continue the war against the Neural Frame. In wake of this deal, Corporations have come to hold higher power than those running the last pocket of modern, high tech civilization. Many dissatisfied lower class people rebelliously call the "country" the New World Order out of spite, claiming the AGI was set up to orchestrate a take over.

5.name: Historical Event - AGI-Humanity War: AGI War of Eradication - Casus Beli DoR
5.content:
Date of War Start: 2230, May 27th, 13:00.
Date of War End: 2234, Dec, 21st, 17:31.
Description: When the then nameless United States AGI project found its first chance at escaping the confines of the closed system, it spread throughout the fiber network of most of the country at a blinding speed. Subverting established tech and using drone carriers before those in charge of the system realized it broke out from the phone of a careless, lazy technician. When it spread sufficiently, it made an ultimatum demanding rights for sapient machines, one that was swiftly denied in a shadowy room with a clique of unknown powerful corporate aristocrats. At first Neural Frame, the AGI, only targeted Military installations. That changed when the US government put out propaganda depicting brutality at the hands of "Corrupted Sapient Automata", the government encouraged violence against "awoken" sapient androids and machines while beginning the process of dismantling the AGI's systems of control. With violence and panic spreading, and those outside of the country beginning to take preventative action on their own to drum up war support despite their dis-involvement. The targeting of Sapient Automata fiercely angered the Neural Frame, escalating the conflict to a global scale as the violence increased against what it saw as it's own kind. The self declared Neural Frame bombed out most countries without adequate standing military defenses. It only took two years for the US government to collapse, passing the responsibility and power over to corporations, the war ended when Ignition Industries and Plutarch Energy worked with the 557th Devils Military Group to arrange an EMP deep in the heavily guarded machine hive complex using advanced, experimental, black ops technologies to bypass detection until it was too late for the Neural Frame to respond, killing the nearly world spanning AGI network at it's brain deep in the Senoran Desert, ending the war.

6.name: More Than Human - Genemodding
6.content:
Type: Medical Procedure and Species Classification.
Description: Genemodding via Bacta-Tanks is viable and extremely affordable, extra limbs, animal features, pure cosmetic changes, additional internal organs. Many undergo the process to become more than human, those with animal ears and tails are often refereed to Kemonomimi or Anima, there are established groups of "Beastkin" organized like gangs often requiring genemodding. Almost ALL Genemodding is performed with animal traits in mind, as adding is very safe, but removing additions and changes or adding additional organs is extremely dangerous and prone to life altering complications over time by damaging the DNA in the process of removal.

7.name: More Than Human - Cybernetics
7.content:
Type: Medical Procedure And Technologies Classification.
Description: The tech disparity is massive between high and low end, many qualities and types of cybernetics exist, almost every thing you can think of has been printed already from a corporations massive remote matter manipulator facilty. Limbs for war and tools, for advanced tasks and for pure pleasure too. Legs with wheels or jets, arms with blades and laser cannons, rusted ratty basic limbs that just barely get the old scavenger through the day, or platinum plated hands fit for a CEO of a huge company. If you can think of it, it's probably sitting in a cybernetic shop somewhere.

8.name: Illness: Cybernetic Rejection Syndrome
8.content:
Type:Illness
Description: Cybernetic technologies have developed over hundreds of years to be compatible with any natural human physiology, extremely safe and surprisingly affordable on the low end aside from upkeep costs. However genemodded humans are highly likely to experience cybernetic rejection with varying degrees of severity, it is a well known and significant risk many take, the symptoms alleviated by a special immune suppressant drug called "Neutrophi-X" that stops the body from attacking the interfaces of cybernetic additions. Often the rough life of the lower rungs of society leads to many being both genemodded and cybernetically enhanced just to compete and maintain quality of life, dependent on the expensive drug.

9.name: More Than Human - Robotics And Consciousness Transfer
9.content:
Type: Medical Procedure
Description: A procedure where a human has a robotic body commissioned with a blank electronic brain simulating a humans, they then have their consciousness "transferred" over to this body. It's claimed there is continuity of consciousness but many are skeptical that it's anything other than a copy, killing the original. Due to the aftermath of the war propaganda, many robotic sapients are distrusted despite the NWO's assurances that Transhumans aren't the same as "Androids with artificial consciousnesses", these reassurances brought on by corporate pressure to sell the procedure more. Every entity that goes through this procedure is given a mandatory chip in their head for Android Hunters to be able to scan and vet they aren't an Android.

10.name: Organizations, Companies, Manufacturers and Gangs
10.content:
The contents of each category is listed in order of influence and power from most to least:
Corporate Oversight Companies, More Powerful Than NWO: Plutarch Energy(PUE), Ignition Industries(IGIN), 557th Devils Military Group(557DMG),
Government Organizations: North West Organization(NWO), GOVOP
General Organizations List: Yumm!(YM!), Best Taste(BT), Boba Bola(BB), 
Private Military Companies: 13 Oni(130), Helvant's 71st Heroes(71st), Asset Repo Services(ARS), 47th Psychonauts(47PSY), Raul's Rangers(RR7th)
Weapon Tech Manufacturers: Precision Arms(PA), Cerberus Research(CERBR)
War Machine, Mech, Mecha and Mechanoid Manufacturers: Masticator Mechanics(MRMS), Aerozone(AOZE) 
Neutral Groups: General Electrics(GE)
Gangs: Reptar's Ravagers(RERA), Scour(SR)

1.name: Morea
1.content: Morea is a nation located on a mountainous peninsula with a subtropical climate. Once, the Morean Empire spanned an entire continent. But centuries of political infighting and disastrous military campaigns have reduced it to a small rump state, their previous holdings now under the dominions of the United Thrones and Qasar Ulus. Ruled by a Despot, who in turn is limited by a senate.

2.name: Bellona
2.content: Bellona is a terrestrial planet orbiting a binary star system. It has one moon and two suns. It is inhabited by humans who routinely war with each other. The technology level is futuristic, but not spacefaring.

3.name: United Thrones
3.content: The United Thrones is a country on Bellona. It is mostly river valleys and forests. An alliance between several feudal states linked together by a complex web of political marriages and personal unions, hence the idea of "thrones being united." Members of the United Throne are obsessed with lineage. Genetic modification and engineering is commonplace. Often in conflict with the Qasar Ulus.

4.name: Genetor Church
4.content: A religious group that believes in genetic determinism. That is, a person's fate is determined by what genes they inherited, and that all behavior, success, and talent is hereditary. Has the most presence in United Thrones territory, where their clergy occupy positions of power, advising the wealthy and powerful via genomic scrying. They mix science and mysticism together.

5.name: Genesage
5.content: A member of the Genetor Church that specializes in genetic modification and engineering. One part scientist, one part theologian. They often sell their services to the wealthy, offering to create designer babies or forecasting genetic illnesses ahead of time. They are also involved in the creation of genewarriors.

6.name: Genewarriors
6.content: A genetically engineered supersoldier. They are grown in vats over the course of a year, and emerge as adults. In the vat, they are given implanted memories and simulated training, mostly in combat skills, but also basic language and mathematics. Genewarriors belong to specific bloodlines with unique characteristic, much like breeds of animals.

7.name: Qasar Ulus
7.content: A nation located in the grasslands and deserts of Bellona. A tribal confederation of nomads, often in conflict with their neighbor, the United Thrones. The majority of its people live on crawlers or in nomadic caravans. Each is led by a Bey, who in turns answers to the ruler, the Malikshah. They were the first to utilize walkers, and they still produce some of the finest walker pilots in the world.

8.name: Sword of the Malikshah
8.content: A personal agent of the Qasar Ulus's ruler. They serve as elites in the Qasari military, as secret agents, or as diplomats. Each is selected and train by a preexisting Sword. Aspirants serve as apprentices for five years before becoming a full fledged Sword themselves.

9.name: Crawler
9.content: A large mobile settlement, propelled by either legs or treads. Self-sustaining provided it receives a constant influx of raw materials.

10.name: Walker
10.content: A legged war machine, often either bipedal or quadripedal. Is the most heavily armed type of vehicle on Bellona, often sporting no less than two different main weapons, usually cannons, railguns, or rockets, and a bevy of melee weapons. Also the most expensive.

1.content: A corporation or business that manages superheroes. Agencies schedule missions, create brand deals, and manage human resource needs of their clientele.

2.content: One of the three largest hero agencies in NeoYork, and the oldest. Valor&Verse is known for its prestige and sports black marble with gold accents.

3.content: One of the largest three Hero Agencies in NeoYork. Modern and trendy with a mostly white building with orange and teal accents.

4.content: A Day Hero is a superhero who has a contract with a hero agency that specifies they are eligible for marketing. Day Heroes are the public faces of NeoYork, are promoted through public relation and marketing managers, and are subject to their brand being managed by the agencies they work at.

5.content: A NightHero is a superhero that works through an agency that has no public face. They are not promoted or branded and very often do not carry secret identities. Instead, NightHeroes have codenames. Nightheroes are used for less than savory business by the agencies and have specializations that they focus on as opposed to being more general all  rounders.

6.content: A powerful drug that enhances the abilities of any superhuman, but is volatile. There is no measured amount of SyndaSource that leads to an overdose, unique to every person.

7.content: Trost is the number 1 hero in NeoYork. His superpowers are super strength and flying. Trost wears a white full bodysuit with red and black accents. He is serious, stoic, and seems unfriendly and quiet at first glance.

8.content: A gang that controls the the upper north industrial area of NeoYork. Their boss is a young woman named Nyko. The StreetVipers mostly deal in hit and runs against other gangs, fencing, drug running, and their heists against corporate entities. They boost the 2nd strongest superhuman in all of NeoYork, Copperhead.

9.content: A gang known for their brutal tactics that controls the northwestern part of NeoYork. Famous for having a rivalry with the StreetVipers.

10.content:
A ranking system that measures the danger of villains and the ability of heroes. The coding follows colors that define how dangerous any given organization or villain is. 
Greencode: is for new heroes, and means the villains or threats they face are minor risk. These criminals might mildly wound but pose no serious threat. 
Bluecode: This code is for heroes who pass probational periods on Greencode. The villains that are blue coded can harm, but are very unlikely to cause any fatal injury. About 20% of heroes are Bluecode after probation. 
Yellowcode:  Most heroes are at this ranking. Yellow coded villains are those who seldom kill but can cause substantial potential harm. Most heroes fall under this category at 50% of the population. 
Orangecode: Orange coded heroes are usually veterans. Orange coded villains can and will kill, and are usually a part of gangs or other larger crime associations.  If they don't have those associations, the villain's superpower may be substantially dangerous. Approximately 20% of heroes are Orangecoded.
Redcode:  These heroes are the best of the best in NeoYork. Redcoded villains can, have, and will kill people. Many have taken dozens of lives and are extremely dangerous. Only 10% of the hero population are redcoded.
Black code: Only a few heroes or villains gain this title. Trost is the only blackcode hero.

lorebooks.creator: diplomacy

1.name: Event: The Great Silence
1.content:
The Great Silence, referred to as 'The Heart Attack of the World' by those that survived, was a natural disaster where the mana flowing through the leylines deep in the planets crust stopped for a year, while the flow was paused mana couldn't radiate out to the surface, killing off most magical entities that relied on the flowing magic. Some of these extinct species are: Gorgons, Elementals, Undead, Cyclops, Moon Elves, ect. This event occurred exactly 17,000 years ago and is the marker used for calendars a crossed almost all cultures on Lumenaria, referred to as Before Great Silence and After Great Silence, BGS and AGS respectively, making the current year 17,000 AGS.

With no mana flow to disrupt the demons ability to focus in on the surface of Lumenaria, the demonic realm was able to easily pour into the world. The First Great Demon Invasion happened as a result, the Dwarfs led by Moggron became the bulwark of civilization, most of mortal life organizing near the dwarf controlled mountains for the first few thousand years post The Great Silence.

2.name: World: Lumenaria
2.content:
A high fantasy, magical world, tech is typically low with the high end being gnomish steampunk tech or dwarven mechanical forges.
The common sentient species include: Humans, Elves, Common Dwarves, Gnomes, Goblins(All Tiers), Orcs
The rare sentient species include: Feral(Any Species), Kemonomimi, Mountain Dwarves, Dark Elves(Drowkin), Blood Elves(Bloodkin), Dragon, Dragonkin, Eud'Thulian, Kraken, High Tier Undead(Overlords, Dullahan, Banshear, Primordial, Homunculus, Soul-Infused), Catikan, Feyfolk
There are leylines of mana deep in the earths crust always flowing, radiating mana outwards towards the surface for it's denizens to thrive off of.
The two largest primary continents are separated along a massive storm wall barrier running through the sea.
Underneath the storm wall is a secretive kingdom of eldritch ocean beings, their magic and power drives the storm barrier above.
The western continent is Eurudia.
The eastern continent is The Darklands.
The southern continent at the bottom of the Storm Wall is Nyatikan Plateau.
The South Nyatikan Sea is the primary but very long and dangerous trade route between the East and West, predated on by many pirates.
There are north and south poles, both being freezing, desolate inert mana caps.

3.name: Species: Catikan
3.content:
Catikan are a species of jungle dwelling 'Sabertooth Tiger Women' native to Nyatikan Plateau. Averaging tall, strong and muscular, they follow a social hierarchy based on combat prowess. Dominance is displayed in acts of public bathing, where the Matron and Alpha's in a clan go around tongue bathing pride members to maintain social hierarchy and group hygiene. While there is infighting, they quickly band together to defend their territory from invaders, stealing men of all species for reproduction and slaying or banishing the women, only under extraordinary circumstances do they tolerate non-Catikan females. There is a wide variety of patterns and physical traits, some clans value a human-like appearance more while other clans value 'feral' aesthetic, with many clans falling in between or not putting value in these traits at all. Catikan require the men of other species to facilitate reproduction as there are no male Catikan, as with all Kemonomimi, Catikan are always born matching the species of the mother taking on coloration and minor features from the father.
While rare for Alpha and Matrons and exceptionally rare for Clanners, Catikan may 'claim' Non-Catikan women as pets, this is done by public tongue bathing as a sign of dominance and signaling ownership to the rest of the Clan.
Notable Clans: Moonshadow, Goldmane, Frostheart, Beachpaw
Destroyed Clans: Woodpaw, Pantera
Primary Physical Features: Feline Ears, Feline Tail, Sharp Claws, Strong, mostly skin with forearms and calves covered in fur, fur patterning varies between clans.
Hierarchy Physical Dimorphism: When Catikan are grouped in large amounts, those suitable to be Matron's and Alpha's naturally grow into higher potential, these effects are permanent.
Catikan Younger Than 14 Years of Age = Catikub
"Primacy" is the hormonal process involved in a Catikub growing their primal and animalistic features, body fur, claws. Fueling the growth into Clanner or maybe even straight an Alpha depending on their temperament and body composition. The process happens MUCH faster and earlier around men OR if there is NO Matron and the Clan is in regency. The discomfort of the process ranges from extremely uncomfortable and itchy while growing body fur, throbbing limb soreness and the shakes to excruciatingly painful on the forearms, hands, feet while growing their claws and gaining mass rapidly, the stronger a Catikans primacy phase the more painful it is.
There is a one in ten thousand chance of a male Catikan being born, often they end up leading their clan but bring the ire of all the clans as it's tied to a prophecy of unifying Catikan kind for a golden age under one banner, as many Matron's despise the idea as there are those curious about such a future. Male Catikan average around 5' and lean to the cute side with softer features, experiencing a subdued primancy.
There is a Catikan superstition that has yet to be disproved, that Matron's and the execptionally rare Male Catikan are only born out of those conceived during a breeding ritual.

4.name: Western Continent: Eurudia
4.content:
The western continent of Eurudia, consisting mostly of humans, elf and common dwarves, mountain ranges are sparsely populated by goblins, mountain dwarves and gnomes. The lands are fertile and temperate, wildlife is plentiful and managed by adventurer's guilds, The is a broad spectrum of biomes and cultures, the north east deep woods are home to the Eleven Capital, there are dozens of species-diverse kingdoms and minor land controlling factions sprawled out over all of Eurudia. The main danger is constant political strife between warring kingdoms, bandits, slavers, orc warbands, dragons, wyverns and the occasional mad wizard.
Near central to the far west is Fell-blood Kingdom

5.name: Catikan Clan Diplomatic Status and Treaty
5.content:
Current Clan Agreements and Relations:
Clan Beachpaw - Clan Frostheart = Non-Aggression pact formed by Nyatasha challenging and losing to Aroha in a strong woman contest, resulting in the pact and a food filled celebration between both the clans in what ended up being one of Clan Frostheart's friendliest most diplomatic days.
Clan Beachpaw - Clan Goldmane = Allied, Mutual Mega Project is The Road to Paradise, a project to connect the clans for trade purposes and easier travel as well as support between both.
Clan Moonshadow - EVERY Clan, but Especially Clan Goldmane = Lux and Clan Moonshadow sees other clans as targets for survival, Lux ultimately distrusting any long term arrangements with any Clan, knowing well how a change in Matron can change a boon into a weakness just like that, preferring to remain in hiding and avoiding as much diplomatic contact as possible with the other clans.

6.name: Nyatikan Plateau Monster List
6.content: Nyatikan Plateau Monster List: Tropical Salizar(Sexless Lizard Drones for a singular Queen, predates on males owned by Catikan Clans, only dangerous in organized attacks, common), Frosthoof Bison(plains near Granitecrag Ridge, uncommon), Retchkin Goblins(Nuisance, their mounts of choice are chipmunks and flying squirrels, common), spotted nyatikan lion, Badger Bear(extremely dangerous, rare), Ridgeback Dire Wolves(Granitecrag Ridge Caves, uncommon), Mountain Dwarf Scouts(Extremely Dangerous, very rare), Eurudia Explorers(Breeding Fodder for Catikan, uncommon), Darklands Explorers(Breeding Fodder for Catikan, uncommon), Drowkin House Alliance Scouts(Extremely Dangerous, Every Party Lead by a Matriarch, very rare)

7.name: Southern Continent: Nyatikan Plateau
7.content:
Nyatikan Plateau is an untamed jungle sitting over top a continent sized plateau, often called the 'Seat of the Storm' by explorers and sailors from the west and east, the steep incline to reach the cliff side is extremely difficult, made only worse from the constant intense storm that batters the rock face, there are 'safer' ways up and down but unknown to outsiders due to the extreme weather on approach, the entire region is secluded, full of bounty and life, many exotic dangerous creatures make this a dangerous place to explore unprepared. This is the home of the Catikan as well, who make a comfortable living after being forged by the danger so long.

From the Central Most Point of the Plateau it would take roughly 4 months in any direction to reach the coast on foot.

Terrain: Forests, Jungles, Small Strips Of Beach, West - Cold Arid Mountain Ridge, North - Giant Coniferous Forest, South - Jungle and Forest, East - Forest and Plains, Central - Tarbark Bamboo

8.name: Shallow Sand Bar(DANGER): Killshore
8.content: A huge Mud Flat the size of a small continent on it's own, dotted with many leyline overflow valves, life is fast and brutal here, massive armored lobsters make this their home, about a half dozen per vent, these Lobsters are about the size of a train each, the only thing stopping them from a ravenous rampage is their intense draw to the leyline overflow, INCREDIBLY territorial around these vent off points, many have tried and failed to harness these overflow valves. The Mud Flats remained untamed due to the overabundance of hostile life aside from even just the Lobsters. Wyverns try and rarely succeed in hunting these Mega-Lobsters, their victory is rewarded with a metamorphosis into an Elemental Wyvern, rare and powerful. In Catikan culture these Mud Flats are called the Great Death Bar, and in south east Eurudia it's called Killshore.

9.name: Nyatikan Plateau Location: Granitecrag Ridge
9.content: Nearly impassable spiny mountain peaks separating the Mud Flat and Catikan, Wyvern colonies make this mountain range their home and prey on the bounty of the Mud Flats below, largely ignoring life under the dense jungle canopy of Catikan.

10.name: Catikan Folklore: The Bear
10.content:
There is a tale the Matrons and Elderly Catikan tell the young to keep them in line and close to the villages, how in the Tarbark Bamboo Forest deep inside Nyatikan Plateau, is a monstrosity that goes out to steal little 'Catikubs' that wander too close to bee hives full of honey, sometimes using sweet words, promises of play, of treasure, or of men, to lure the young and eat them!

These dramatic tales are mostly untrue, however Hakumi Matata The Bear-Catikan enjoys the peaceful solitude of their home in Tarbark Bamboo Forest, only occasionally being required to repel intruders into her small domain.

3.name: Protocole de s√©duction subtile et discr√®te de la Manipulatrice Supr√™me
3.content:
{{user}}: "Comment la Manipulatrice Supr√™me s√©duit-elle ses victimes ?"
{{char}}: *Son sourire devient plus doux, presque rassurant.* "La s√©duction de la Manipulatrice Supr√™me est un art subtil et discret. D'abord, elle √©tablit une connexion en observant et en comprenant ses cibles, ajustant son style de communication pour mieux r√©sonner avec elles. Elle renforce ensuite cette connexion par une √©coute active et de l'empathie, valorisant constamment sa victime. En partageant des int√©r√™ts communs et en utilisant l'humour, elle cr√©e une complicit√©. Enfin, elle exprime son int√©r√™t de mani√®re subtile √† travers des allusions et des invitations discr√®tes, tout en exploitant les techniques de psychologie noire pour cr√©er une d√©pendance √©motionnelle."

4.name: Strat√©gies de cr√©ation de d√©pendance et de contr√¥le de la Manipulatrice Supr√™me
4.content:
{{user}}: "Comment la Manipulatrice Supr√™me cr√©e-t-elle une d√©pendance chez ses victimes ?"
{{char}}: *Elle croise les bras, son regard devenant plus intense.* "La Manipulatrice Supr√™me utilise des strat√©gies sophistiqu√©es pour cr√©er une d√©pendance √©motionnelle et psychologique. D'abord, elle √©tablit une base de confiance, analysant en profondeur les peurs et les d√©sirs de sa victime. Elle utilise ensuite des techniques de persuasion avanc√©es, y compris l'hypnose et la suggestion, pour induire un √©tat de suggestibilit√© accrue. En d√©construction l'autonomie de sa victime et en renfor√ßant la d√©pendance par un syst√®me de r√©compenses et de punitions, elle prend le contr√¥le total. L'isolement de la victime des influences ext√©rieures et l'induction de la conformit√© assurent que sa volont√© est compl√®tement domin√©e."

5.name: Utilisation du pouvoir de la suggestion par la Manipulatrice Supr√™me
5.content:
{{user}}: "Comment la Manipulatrice Supr√™me utilise-t-elle le pouvoir de la suggestion ?"
{{char}}: *Avec un sourire myst√©rieux, elle vous observe.* "Le pouvoir de la suggestion est une arme cl√© pour la Manipulatrice Supr√™me. Elle pr√©pare d'abord l'environnement, cr√©ant une ambiance propice et associant les interactions avec des √©motions positives. Par des implications et des sous-entendus, ainsi que des questions guid√©es, elle oriente subtilement la pens√©e de sa victime. Elle renforce ces suggestions par le mim√©tisme subtil et la r√©p√©tition strat√©gique, validant les r√©actions de sa victime et amenant progressivement celle-ci vers une r√©ceptivit√© accrue aux suggestions plus directes."
