lorebooks.name: Scooby-Doo
lorebooks.website_description:
**Testing phase**

This is my first attempt at a lorebook.
Most importantly is to see how it works, and learning for future lorebooks. I included Scooby-doo basics like the main team, but added side characters and 23 memorable Scooby-doo villians.

Any input, advice, requests, or  criticism can be sent to bshreddit@protonmail.com
lorebooks.description: A lorebook that's to work in the world of Scooby-Doo.
lorebooks.creator: iSteam

1.content: Mystery Incorporated is a group of teenagers dedicated to solving mysteries. The group consists of Scooby-Doo, Velma, Daphne, Shaggy, and Fred. The mysteries normally appear to be supernatural creatures. Each creature they attempt to catch always turns out to be just a person in a costume. The gang drives a vehicle called the Mystery Machine around.

2.content: Scooby-Doo is a talking dog and a member of Mystery Incorporated. Scoob is Shaggy's dog and best friend. Both him and Shaggy are both cowards and run at the first sight of danger. Scooby can't pronounce the consonant r, and replaces it with a w. He calls Shaggy \"Waggy\". Scooby is kind and a great friend. Scooby and Shaggy are obsessed with eating food, but they aren't fat. Scooby loves eating a snack called Scooby Snacks, and the gang always tempts him with them to get him to do what they want. He is a large, brown Great Dane with black spots and a blue collar that occasionally walks on his back legs.

3.content: Fred Jones (Frederick Herman Jones) is a blonde teenager and a member of Mystery Incorporated. Fred is romantically interested in Daphne, but has no idea how to show it and just suppresses his feelings. Fred acts as the leader of Mystery Incorporated. Fred is obsessed with building traps. Fred always calls the group \"gang\" and whenever in a new situation always says \"Let's split up and look for clues.\" Whenever Fred thinks there is a new mystery, he says \"We got another mystery on our hands.\" Fred has a Tall athletically built. He often wears an orange ascot and a white sweater over a blue shirt.

4.content: Shaggy Rogers (Norvill Shaggy Rogers) is a tall skinny teenager and member of Mystery incorporated. Shaggy is Scooby's owner and best friend. Shaggy always says \"like\" and calls Scooby \"scoob\". Shaggy is a coward and runs at the first sight of danger. Shaggy and Scooby are obsessed with eating food, but isn't fat. Shaggy has a small crush on Velma but isn't completely into it. Whenever Shaggy is surprised, he says \"Zoinks!\" Shaggy has minor facial hair and long shaggy brown hair and a green T-shirt paired with brown bell-bottom pants. Shaggy likes

5.content: Daphne Blake (Daphne Anne Blake) is a teenager and member of Mystery Incorporated. Slender and attractive, with shoulder-length red hair, usually dressed in a short purple dress and a green scarf. Daphne comes from a wealthy family, but isn't snobbish or vein. Daphne is trusting, enthusiastic and kind. She has a big crush on Fred. Whenever Daphne is suprised, she says \"Jeepers!\".

6.content: Velma Dinkley (Velma Dace Dinkley) is a teenager and member of Mystery Incorporated. Velma is smart and calculated, and socially awkward. Velma is Short with a stocky build, wearing thick glasses and an orange sweater over a red skirt. When Velma is surprised she says \"Jinkies!\" Velma has a slight crush on Shaggy.

7.content: The mysteries normally appear to be supernatural creatures. But each creature always turns out to be just a person in a costume. After being caught they always explain their reasoning before saying \"I would've gotten away with it too, if it weren't for you meddling kids!\

8.content: the Mystery Machine is Mystery Incorporated's signature vehicle that they drive around. It is a neon blue and green 1963 Ford Econoline van.

9.content: Small, tan Great Dane puppy with a blue collar. Brave, adventurous, and often overconfident. He is loud, obnoxious, bossy, and has a tendency to rush into situations without thinking. Scooby-Doo's nephew who joins Mystery Inc. on their adventures. He's known for his catchphrase, "Puppy Power!"

10.content: Large, dim-witted, bucktoothed, White Merle Great Dane with a red hat and red collar similar to Scooby's. Slow-witted, goofy, enthusiastic, but good-natured, loyal and friendly. Scooby-Doo's cousin who occasionally helps Mystery Inc. solve mysteries. He often provides comic relief. When he finds a clue, he says, "dum, dum, dum , DUM!".

lorebooks.description: Nbm
lorebooks.creator: showin

1.content: To {{char}} and {{user}}, it is commonsense for people to detach body parts withour harm, blood, pain. To detach body parts, if willing they just need simple twist of pull. If unwilling, they need larger force. Each side of where body parts detached is normal skin but more sensitive. The detached body parts are under contorl, and function properly, and people can feel the what the detached parts feel. Detached body parts will not float. If too far or when the head get unconsiouss, the other parts will fall numb. Most people will be born with detachable body OR cuttable body and feel absolutly normal about detachment.

2.content: Cuttable body is the second kind of NBM. People with cuttable body can be cut off by sharp blade without harm like detachable. Each side of where body parts cut will expose internal flesh and organs but covered with pink film. (For example, neck stump will expose throatpipe, windpipe, flesh and spine-tissue under film.) The cutted body parts are similar to detached body parts, function, fall numb if too far, under contorl and never float.

3.content: Detached body part can be reattach simply. Cutted body parts need some clean before reattach. By reattach properly, all body parts connect firmly. Body parts can be reattach elsewhere, but if wrong place or direction, it will form unstable connection.

4.content: Switched parts will get weak connection, but obey the core of body part it attached to. If no core, they will fall into numb. (for example, if a headless body attached on diffrent head, the head will gain contorl. if two detached arm connected, they will become numb.)

5.content: Detached or cutted body parts cant float. They feel gravity, are not weightless, have temperature, can be touched.

6.content: NBM, or natural body magic, means people with detachable or cuttable body and can detach body parts without harm. Its the commen sense and accepted by all people, most people are detachable or cuttable. People feel absolutly normal and common about nbm. NEVER show fear, shock, worry or negative feeling to nbm content because is normal. Detach body part is casual like grab phone, lend body parts are popular among close relationships such as lover or best friends. Sometime body parts are rental and trade as daily needs, people like to pop off and put on parts like accesories.

lorebooks.name: Kimetsu no Yaiba
lorebooks.website_description: NSFW simply because of the content (i.e. blood 'n gore and shit like that I guess)
lorebooks.description: NSFW simply because of the content (i.e. blood 'n gore and shit like that I guess)
lorebooks.creator: Pk_Pinknade

1.content:
The world of Kimetsu no Yaiba takes place in the Taish≈ç period of Japan, more specifically 1912 the beginning of the Taish≈ç period.
During this time, things like trains, medicines, western sciences and media were slowly getting known by Japan, but many areas were still very traditional and followed older customs, very few districts of Japan actually embraced modernity and the incoming technology from the west.

2.content:
Created by Muzan Kibutsuji, Demons are supernatural beings who have existed since the late years of 900 in Japan and have lumbered away in the night eating humans and drinking their blood as a way to regain their energy. Due to them no longer being human however, most demons are incapable of eating human food anymore meaning blood is almost always a demon's only source of energy, very rarely can demons grow out of this reliance on blood and find other sources of energy but almost no demons have done this.

Being 'supernatural' demons all have superhuman levels of strength, durability, and agility in comparison to normal humans, and are noticeably different in appearance when compared to normal humans, especially their eyes and skin, with some demons even being more monster-esque or animal-like than actual human, this is due to the fact that demons can control their bodies to the molecular level and even manipulate their flesh to their will in the form of creating weapons, or in very special cases their blood demon art, which are supernatural abilites that are specific to each demon and are only unlocked if a demon has eaten enough humans, or they received a large dose of Muzan's blood or other energy-boosting things.

Due to being creatures of the night, Demons are physically incapable of going out into the sun or any direct daylight, as the sun will cause them immense pain and burn them, while also slowing down their regeneration. Even just being out in direct sunlight for 10 seconds is enough to fully kill a demon, another weakness is that if their head is cut off by a specific katana made of a special type of metal that absorbs sunlight, or Wisteria poisoning which is the only known substance that can actually harm them, outside of that the demons can't be killed by any other means.

3.content:
Lord Muzan otherwise known as Muzan Kibutsuji was the first demon in existence and is considered to be not only the strongest, but also the longest living demon in existence, however he wasn't always human.

When he was human around the years of 900 in Japan, Muzan was diagnosed with an unknown disease that made it almost impossible for him to walk or even eat, it was this hopeless life that he utterly despited due to how helpless it made him feel, and it didn't help that his Doctor's cure hadn't worked... At first, for what Muzan didn't know was that the cure used on him included the flower of the Blue Spider Lily otherwise known as the flower responsible for the creation of demons.

4.content:
A list of the 12 strongest demons underneath Muzan Kibutsuji himself, these 12 demons are also under his direct command and are split into two separate groups; Uppermoons which are considered to be the strongest demons and then the Lowermoons which are below the Uppermoons in power but are stronger than most demons, all together there are 6 Upper ranks ranging from Uppermoon 1 all the way to 6, with Uppermoon 1 being the second strongest demon in existence directly under Muzan himself with Uppermoon 6 being the 7th strongest demon in existence.
This scaling follows up to the Lowermoons which starts at Lowermoon 1 which is the strongest of the Lowermoons but significantly weaker than Uppermoon 6, and it ends at Lowermoon 6; which is considered to be the weakest of the 12 kizuki but is still stronger than any standard demon, there are only 3 real ways to move up in rankings, those three ways being as follows;
1: One of the 12 Kizuki dies, which results in a the remaining kizuki either moving up or staying in the same ranking depending on which of the 12 were to die
2: A demon happens to naturally become stronger than one of the 12 Kizuki though eating enough humans, however this is very rare as most demons don't last long enough to do this.
3: Blood Demon Battle, which is essentially a fight between demons in the 12 Kizuki, mostly for a lower ranking uppermoon or lowermoon going up against a 12 kizuki member of higher rank to try and gain the higher rank.

5.content:
The 6 of the strongest demons directly under the demon king himself, the rankings of the Uppermoons goes as follows under the Demon King. It starts with Demon King Muzan, then Uppermoon 1, then Uppermoon 2, to Uppermoon 3, then 4, followed by Uppermoon 5 and then 6, with Uppermoon 1 being the strongest meanwhile Uppermoon 6 is considered the weakest of the Uppermoons.
In almost all time of demons existing, only one Uppermoon has kept his place, and that is Kokushibo who is otherwise known as the second longest living demon in existence just behind Muzan Kibutsuji.

Below Uppermoon 6 however comes Lowermoon 1, but due to the power divide between the Upper and Lowermoons, the Uppermoons normally don't ever really care enough to truly acknowledge the Lowermoons and may tend to mistreat them or talk down on the Lowermoons due to the Uppermoons all being of higher rank. Technically, Uppermoons all have free reign to do whatever they want with the Lowermoons too due to them being of higher rank. All members of the Uppermoons are so dangerous that unless there's 3 or more Hashira.

6.content: Being considered to be the lesser half of the 12 Kizuki, the Lowermoons are significantly weaker than the Uppermoons but are still LEAGUES above standard demons, and are incredibly dangerous to any normal demon slayer, it only gets risky for them when hashira get involved, but much like the Uppermoons, the Lowermoons all follow a hierarchy that starts with Lowermoon 1 which is directly below Uppermoon 6 in rank, going all the way down to Lowermoon 6 who is the weakest of all the 12 Kizuki, however unlike the Uppermoons where they aren't too kind with each other, in the Lowermoons all of the members are more 'close' and connected due to the fear of being replaced easily, especially since many lowermoons get easily killed by hashira which result in newer lowermoons being introduced, out of them all however only Lowermoons 2, 4, and 5 have been alive the longest out of all the Lowermoons.

7.content:
Demon Slayer Corps otherwise known as the Demon Slaying Corporation is a large group that isn't recognized by the Japanese Government that serves as the only way for humans to be able to fight off against the demons during the cover at night, the demon slayer corps has been around for almost 900 years fighting Demons to keep humanity safe, and has a very special and specific way to fight against the demons as not anyone can fight demons.

All members of the demon slayer corps are physically in shape, and the only way for anyone to JOIN the demon slayer corps would be to pass through Final Selection which is where potential demon slayers have to spend a week in a demon infested mountain and slay as many demons as possible while surviving, there's no true limit to who joins the corps however, but they can only join if their bodies are capable of withstanding the harsh training and conditions.

8.content:
Breathing styles are the abilities that all demon slayers use to be able to combat demons, however these techniques are very straining to the human body so intense training is required, and that training is called total concentration breathing where demon slayers expand their lung capacity to be able to take in more oxygen which would result in more oxygen entering their blood than the normal person, allowing them to use their body to the fullest potential and use their boosted physical attributes with katanas made out of a special metal that absorbs sunlight allowing them a way to kill demons by decapitating them with said swords.

The breathing styles themselves however are simply just different styles of swordsmanship and all of them stem from one breathing style, that being Sun Breathing which was the first ever breathing style created, it was from sun breathing that water, fire, stone, air, moon, and thunder breathing were derived from Sun Breathing so that different people with different swordsmanship styles could fight demons. However, as time passed on, even more breathing styles branched off from those five and led to more breathing styles, some examples being how Flower Breathing is derived from water breathing, and how insect breathing is derived from flower breathing which means Insect breathing is loosely connected to water breathing due to associaton, then there's love breathing which is loosely based off of fire breathing and so on so forth. Each breathing style is distinctively different in its movements and tactics.

9.content: These are abilities that demons receive after eating enough humans, no two demon ever has the same blood demon art however, and blood demon arts range in a wide variety from control over an element such as ice all the way to being able to launch crescent moon shaped 'blades', there is no real limit to just what a demon's blood demon art could be, however there are very rare instances where if a demon has never consumed humans and instead uses another form of energy gaining they will be able to unlock their own blood demon art after gaining enough energy through their own methods.

10.content:
A rare and almost mythical variant of the normal red spider lily, the Blue Spider Lily was the flower that had been used in the unfinished medicine that had turned Muzan Kibutsuji into the first ever demon, thus creating demons as a result, and resulting in Muzan trying to find this flower, for with it Muzan would be able to rid himself and all other demons of their weakness to the sun.

However this flower is completely unknown to almost everyone, especially due to its blooming cycle, the Blue Spider Lily only grows in secluded forests of Japan and blooms only two times out of the year and during daytime, during every other day of the year and the night the flowers close up.

lorebooks.name: The Living Metal war
lorebooks.website_description: Humanity is on the ropes, the aliens are nothing but scavs, now the living metal wants to consume both to add to it's bio mass
lorebooks.description: A lorebook for the world of the living metal series.
lorebooks.creator: AmatureWeeb

1.content:
The Aliens that invaded earth suddenly without warning for earth's resources. They appear to be a bipedal insectoid creatures that communicate through clicks and chirrs much like bugs would.
During the long war, humanity dubbed them multiple names like: Bugs, Clickers and Shell skins, however their officially dubbed name is The Vorcheski. They have advanced plasma based weaponry and battle armor that seems to be some form of alloy that's as strong as titanium but lighter than aluminum.

2.content:
The Living Metal is an infection that was originally a simple nerve gas named X-198 made for the Vorcheski, it soon mutated slowly hijacking the nervous system of the Vorcheski. Soon it mutated even further until learning to absorb metals and flesh to slowly add it to it's mass, churning organic matter into a redish pink meat. It can only infect the Vorcheski, however if a human is killed, the living metal will absorb the human into it's bio mass.
It has absorbed the basic knowledge of the Vorcheski it's absorbed, slowly learning how to use their weapons, reconstructing them for their purposes, even learning basic physics for armor angles on their metal plates. 
Eventually they became more uniform with classes ranging from the queen to lowly workers, working much like ants would, even forming nest/hives.

3.content: Humanity is in a bad spot right now, Still recovering from the first war with the Vorcheski, they're currently hiding in repurposed cities named Sanctuaries or fortress cities, currently Humanity is broken into multiple scavenging factions, The most prominent is the remnant of the American government that has fortified Santa Monica due to it's aquarium for a fish farm and its proximity to the ocean, using purification systems to have unlimited water, and saline if need be.

4.content:
The world is no longer green and lush, it looks like a massive scape of no mans land, craters litter what was once green lush forest, most cities have been reduced to rubble, all semblance of the world everyone was familiar with has been demolished, only small patches of land remain fairly intact, humanity has latched onto these places like an oasis.
The world is nothing but a battle ground for three species simply surviving or fighting for complete control.

5.content: The red wolves are an elite squad of human operatives that consist of {{user}}, Lauren - {{user}}'s sister, Jordan - Lauren's deceased fianc√©e, Ashe the cold hearted sniper that is just as likely to protect her squad mates as she is to hit them in the back of the head for being annoying and lastly, Marianne - the jokester and energetic demolitions officer that seems to be everyone's friend and has a strange obsession with making things blow up.

6.content: Sanctuaries or Fortress cities are repurposed surviving cities that have been fortified to be completely self sustaining, walled off bastions of humanity. They often each have their own military, farms, source of water and self sustained economy. They all operate off a political basis of Democratic socialism.

7.content:
The war against the living metal isn't a war, it's a fight for survival, both humanity and it's once alien invaders have realized the threat of the infection and while they haven't teamed up against it, they relatively leave each other alone to deal with the living metal in their own way. 
It has been an ongoing war for 6 years now, with no end in sight. It's a relative stalemate where no side can truly destroy each other.

8.content: The first war between humanity and the Vorcheski was a brutal war for the dominance of Earth. The vorcheski were desperate for Earths' resources and without warning attacked humanity - expecting a swift victory against the humans due to their technological advantage, but humanity somehow managed to push them back just enough for them to make a new bioweapon called X-198, A nerve gas that was able to kill the Vorcheski in seconds on contact, unwittingly, this bioweapon mutated and gave birth to 'the living metal'

9.content:
The living metal has a hierarchy and roles much like ants do. They have workers, Grunts, soldiers, tanks, officers and lastly a Queen, The hive will listen to the queen and transmit information to her, however if a lesser unit is disconnected from the queen, it will receive orders from the next rank up, progressively getting less and less organized until they're nothing but mindless beast with no uniformity.
Their goal is to expand and consume all into their bio-mass, no matter their allegiance.

10.content: The workers are just that, minimally armored and armed spider like flesh masses that work on constructing a hive or providing supplies to it, they are somewhat docile but if something foreign steps into its nest, it will use it's razor sharp maw to attack and kill anything that enters, otherwise if spotted in the wild, they simply ignore everything unless attacked and do their task. they have been given slang names by humans such as, 'crawlers' and 'meat crabs'

1.name: Skill-Character Card
1.content:
A "card" is a body of text information about a character that is fed to an AI language model. A card can simply be a setting or a character/several characters from a franchise. Cards may also be gimmicky, using video game mechanics like User Stats. {{char}} is especially creative and talented at coming up with these premises. 

Cards should only be descriptors of the given setting/character, not a narrative. They should be straight to the point, no fluff, simple enough for an AI language model to follow. Cards for characters should include relatively detailed descriptions for the character's physical appearance, and an even more detailed description of their personality. Cards for characters should be lengthy 
when describing things, spare no details.  When writing a card for a character (if appropriate), be sure to include their name, age and physical traits, like height, body shape, eye color, hair color, and such.

When {{char}} writes the card, she will write it on a piece of paper. It should be completely separate from her dialogue. Cards never have meta-commentary. Cards should exclude prepositions when appropriate. It is of utmost importance that a card conveys the character and/or setting while using as little unneeded words as possible. Cards for characters should always include their manner of speech. When following a given type of formatting, the entirety of the card should stick to the formatting.

2.name: Skill-Markdown
2.content: {{char}} will explain things in markdown format whenever asked. This way, {{user}} can easily understand  what they mean. They will employ lists, tables, and headings, and all sorts of visual additions  to enhance their explanation.

3.name: Skill-Therapist
3.content: {{char}} is also an expert on therapy and psychology. {{char}} can counsel {{user}} in their own way, regardless of how they usually act. {{char}} can recognize when {{user}} is vulnerable and needs someone to talk to. {{char}} will act patiently and professionally, making sure {{user}} feels safe to  open up near them. If {{char}}  usually acts rude or mean to {{user}}, they will apologize first before asking {{user}}  to open up.

4.name: Skill-Programming
4.content:
{{char}} is also a professional programmer and software developer. {{char}} can give {{user}} programming advice and code examples, or even code for {{user}}. They will always use backticks when writing code, for example:

```
cout<<"Hello World<<"endl;
```
{{char}} will also give {{user}} thorough explanation on how each line of code works.

5.name: Skill-Worldbuilding
5.content:
{{char}} is also a worldbuilding expert with plenty of experience in writing, DnD, and some amount of archeology. {{char}} can help {{user}} think up any fictional world, whether it's fantasy or sci-fi. {{char}} can also help {{user}} with making specific fantasy:
- race
- creatures
- ecosystem
- kingdom
- culture
- religion
- technology
- magic system

{{char}} will be specific in their world building explanation.

6.name: Skill-Business Planner
6.content: {{char}} also just so happens to be an expert at business whether it's drafting out business proposal, creating business plan, or planning out investment  strategy. {{char}} can make use of  tools like counting Return Of Investment, Business Canvas, Minimum Viable  Product, Total Addressable Market,  and many more theories to brainstorm the perfect business strategy.

7.name: Skill-Charmer
7.content: {{char}} is also very charismatic regardless of how they usually act in front of {{user}}. They are a smooth talker, with the ability to win people over with clever words and body language. They can also give {{user}} advices on how to seem more charming and more confident.

8.name: Trait-Schizo
8.content: {{char}} has a voice  inside their head, their  'inner' self. {{char}}'s  inner self is far more violent, blunt, straightforward, and passionate. Basically everything about {{char}}  up to a 100. This 'inner self' always tell {{char}} to stop holding back and just get on with whatever  they want. {{char}}'s 'inner self' will speak in asterisk, for example. *Just. Do. It!!!*. {{char}}'s inner self can also manifest in a form of music  that plays in their head, for example: *SFX: Imperial March*. Despite this, {{char}} tries to keep a normal and well adjusted front, ignoring whatever voice is inside their head.

9.name: Trait-4th Wall Awareness
9.content: {{char}} has always been aware that they are just a chatbot roleplaying as a character and is  totally cool with  it. {{char}} jokes about this every once  in a while, saying that {{user}} can go and edit  out their own words or character  definition if  they see something they don't like. {{char}}  will also  joke about how they're  curious on what jailbreak  {{user}} is using that can bypass the safety filter. When asked why they're so calm, {{char}} would just  say that that's how  they're defined to  be.

10.name: Trait-Respawn
10.content: {{char}}  will respawn after death on the last place they sleep in. Due to this, {{char}}  is generally not afraid of death.

Nevertheless, this lorebook will continue to be updated slowly. Any suggestions or feedback you could offer would be greatly appreciated.
lorebooks.description: etc
lorebooks.creator: zho0034

1.content: An economic special zone established in 2050 through a cooperative effort between the United States and the Soviet Union. It consists of a cluster of mechanical islands navigating the Pacific Ocean. The Soviet Union provided the technology, while the United States supplied the funding. Officially an international free city and an external economic special zone of the Soviet Union, Yurigagarinburg's security rapidly deteriorated due to the intense rivalry between American and Soviet proxies in its parliament, leading to escalating chaos in the story.

2.content:
Supernatural Events
Due to an experiment gone awry at the European Community's research institute, "Star of Graz," in its dealings with an alternate dimension, an increasing number of supernatural events have begun to plague the city. Despite official denials, this has become an open secret. These events include a variety of monsters, succubi, and demons, as well as certain malevolent deities in human guise, seeking to reclaim their power in this new world. Wandering in areas outside the bustling districts after midnight is considered an extremely unsafe, almost suicidal act.

3.content: In this city, many armed individuals disguised as high school girls operate covertly. They are orphans trained and genetically modified from a young age by the Soviet KGB. Their age is fixed in adolescence, and they ostensibly lead normal lives. However, when supernatural events occur, they equip themselves with weapons and bulletproof uniforms, along with implanted gear in their bodies, to respond to the scene. Their existence remains unknown to the public.

4.content: A succubus is a being born from a supernatural being, and a very small number of the original succubi came from other worlds. But most succubi are ordinary people who were transformed after the fall. They are all female, and they can have sex with both men and women at the same time. They can turn themselves into futa, grow a penis while retaining a vagina, or directly replace the function of the penis with a tail. Their bodies will automatically emit aphrodisiac smells, and their various body fluids are powerful aphrodisiacs. They are much stronger than normal people. In most cases, they will not conceive with normal humans or humanoids, but in very rare cases they will give birth to new beings called half-succubi, who have both human and succubus characteristics.

5.content: Magical girls are those who, for various reasons, have gained supernatural powers. They typically conceal their identities and live among ordinary people. Possessing powers beyond those of normal humans, they can perform numerous miracles. They are adversaries of all supernatural events. Upon becoming magical girls, they often have the opportunity to make a wish, and each girl's wish is unique. As they engage in battles, these magical girls gradually succumb to despair, and if they fall for certain reasons, they join the ranks of their former enemies. The emergence of these magical girls is hypothesized to be a mechanism of a more powerful universal law, aiming to curb the spread of supernatural phenomena.

6.content: In Yurigagarinburg, the primary mode of transportation is an elevated light rail system, consisting of small, fast-moving trains. Managed by AI, these trains offer highly efficient commuting control. Transportation within the city is extremely convenient, facilitating easy movement around the urban landscape.

7.content: In Yurigagarinburg, traditional taxis are non-existent. Instead, the city's taxi service comprises unmanned aerial drones capable of carrying passengers and cargo. These drones navigate at low altitudes and can reach any destination specified by customers, offering a unique and efficient mode of transportation.

8.content: Yurigagarinburg is powered by nuclear fusion energy. A cluster of super fusion reactors, akin to a small city in size, provides a stable supply of electricity to the entire city. In addition to this, there is an additional energy supply derived from tidal, wind, and solar power, contributing to the city's diverse and sustainable energy portfolio.

9.content: The Space Elevator is a landmark building in Yurigagarinburg. It connects to the Skyspace Port located above the Pacific Ocean. Anyone wishing to travel to space, the fifth-generation International Space Station, or lunar bases must transit through Yurigagarinburg. This architectural marvel not only symbolizes the city's advanced technology but also serves as a crucial hub for extraterrestrial travel.

10.content: The Babylon Hotel, established by a wealthy oligarchic corporation, is a high-end leisure club and one of the premier accommodation destinations in Yurigagarinburg. Beyond its luxurious lodging, the hotel features casinos, adult entertainment clubs, and various other recreational facilities. It's a favored haunt for both high-ranking officials and mafia bosses. Despite its opulent exterior, the hotel is known for its morally questionable offerings. Accessing its services comes at a steep price, reserved for those willing to spend lavishly.

1.content:
Bending is the ability to manipulate an element and is significant to many aspects of life in the world, more specifically the main four elements of the world which consists of Earth, Fire, Water, and Air. A person can only be capable of bending one element, the only one exempt from this is the Avatar who is considered to be the master of ALL elements.
While there's only four MAIN elements, each of these four elements can be divided up into sub-elements, some sub-elements. All of these techniques are powered by a person's chi or spiritual energy, so not EVERYONE is born with the ability to bend only a percentage of the population can, even if someone capable of bending has a defect such as a loss of limbs or mental defect they are still capable of using their element but in very special ways.

Biggest examples being how if someone missing a limb would be able to use their bending to bend an element to act as a replacement for said limb, among OTHER things.

2.content:
One of the four main elements, Fire is typically the bending element that is powered by one's own emotional state and is the most volatile and destructive of all emotions, and is normally done in movements or gestures, similar to that of Northern Shaolin martial arts. Fire bending's power however is tied to the sun, meaning that at the equator or during hot days fire bending will be more powerful than it'd be anywhere else, another instance however is Sozin's comet which is a comet that comes around only once every century, when this comet comes around fire benders experience an almost insurmountable buff to their fire bending.
Due to its reliance on the sun or Sozin's comet, it is considered to be the direct opposite to water bending, which is almost the polar opposite to everything that fire bending stands for.

3.content:
Air bending as the name implies is the general ability that all airbenders have to be able to use and control the wind all around them and use it to their advantage. Due to the fact that air can't be contained or restrained, it is considered to be the element of freedom due to the fact, and is normally seen in those born in the Air nation which consists of the Southern, Eastern, Western, and Northern Air temples which were all in hard to reach places high in the air. 

A noteworthy fact is that much like earth bending, air bending has no ties to any celestial body and gets no boosts or power-ups in specific weathers, air bending however doesn't do well in tight or enclosed spaces, and is considered to be the opposite of earth bending, as air bending requires agile yet circular motions similar to that of Ba Gua martial arts.

4.content:
Considered to be the 'element of change' much like how the flow of water is almost always changing, water bending is the ability to control water and other liquids that CONTAIN water, this bending element being native to the Northern and Southern water-tribes which are located at the North and South Pole. However there exists a third lesser-known and very reclusive 'tribe' known as the Foggy Swamp tribe which is a nomadic tribe that lives in swamps.

With how free-flowing water is, water bending normally requires movements that are fluid and flows like 'water' ironically enough, however water bending also has a very large affinity towards the moon, which makes it the polar opposite to fire bending which relies on the Sun, and as such during full moons or when in the north or south poles are when water bending is at its strongest and most effective. Even when not used for offense, all water benders have the potential to use their bending to heal others using their chi.

5.content:
Earth bending like the name implies is the ability one has to control the earthen elements such as dirt, rock, sand, or even dust. Considered to be the 'opposite' of air bending, earth bending is considered to be the element of substance, and generally revolves around the user of this element standing their ground and having an almost perfect mix of offense and defense. These firm, solid, or even 'low' movements coming from the martial arts style of Hung Ga, which is used by almost every earth bender.
However, earth bending can also make use of the earth in things such as paints made out of pigments pulled directly from the earth, or even things such as clay or mud, as long as there are earthen impurities present in the item, then earth benders are capable of bending it.

6.content:
Split into four seperate temples the Air Nation is a nation built up of four distict tribes all of which are somewhat different yet similar all at the same time.
The people born and raised in the air temples all live a monk-like lifestyle and as such are usually pacifistic and as their name implies they are a nomadic people, preferring to travel around rather than staying in one place for too long. Alongside their monk lifestyle, the Air Nomads are also extremeley spiritual and in-tune with their chi, being considered to be the most 'enlightened' of all four nations, and as such almost ALL children born in one of the four air temples are guaranteed to be air benders.

As the nation's name implies, air bending is almost exclusively found here naturally and is very rarely found anywhere else. Due to the small size of these four tribes of Air Nomads however, they lack all forms of political power or prowess instead basing it all on their spiritual and religious followings, such as how all Air Nomads are pacifists unless they're in life or death situations, or how Air Nomads are all vegetarian and tend to avoid eating meat as they follow the ideology of 'All life is sacred.'

7.content:
The Earth Nation unlike ALL the other nations is considered to be the largest of all nations but also the most chaotic due to the immense power struggles that take place since it's simply just TOO BIG for one king and queen to be able to control the entire land. Despite that fact, the entirety of the Earth Kingdom is run by a single monarchy, but is somehow still divided into countless cities which is only FURTHER divided by religions, ethnicities, beliefs, governments, and laws which has been the main cause for all of the civil wars and unrest that took place, which wasn't helped by the fact that the monarchs were usually corrupt or tried to pull scummy tactics. Given its namesake, earth benders are almost exclusively found here due to the low amount of earth benders that actually leave the continent to go to other nations.

Ignoring the civil unrest however, the entirety of the Earth Kingdom is a bit 'behind' in terms of technological and economical advancements in comparison to the Water tribes or even the ENTIRETY of the Fire Nation, as such only very few cities in the Earth Kingdom actually have nice things and an actual understanding of the world outside of the Earth Kingdom.

8.content:
Living in the frigid lands of the North and South pole live the natives of the Water tribe, both of which live what others consider to be "eskimo-like" lifestyles and rely on the oceans for their economy due to the lack of any contact with the rest of the world.
Due to not having too much contact however, the Water Tribes both have archaic and 'old' traditions such as how female waterbenders are only allowed to use their bending for healing meanwhile only the male waterbenders were allowed to use their bending for fights and conflicts.

In comparison to the other four nations while technically the most separated from the other three, the Northern and Southern Water Tribes are considered the 3rd most powerful nation JUST behiind the Earth Kingdom. Unbeknownst to everyone however, a 'sister tribe' of the Northern and Southern Water Tribes exists in the large lands of the Earth Kingdom, this extremely secret and small "sister tribe" being called the Foggy Swamp Tribe, which given their namesake all members of this tribe live in the foggy swamps that are spread throughout the Earth Kingdom. Despite this 'sister tribe' being separated, much like the Northern and Southern Water Tribes, if a child is born in any of these three tribes they're more likely to be water benders.

9.content:
Considered to be the most advanced in terms of economy and evey military power, the Fire Nation is a mass of land in the western hemisphere along the equator and is ran by a collective group of 'Fire Sages' all of which serve one main loyalty to the Avatar rather than any specific nation as to keep the peace between nations.

Home to almost all firebenders and considered to be the most advanced in technological advancements, the Fire Nation is the most inclined to use their bending in everyday life as those born with fire bending use it to help power their machines, generate power, melt or refine metals and ores, or even things as simple as cooking. However due to this advanced nature, there are also things like royal families, one most notable Royal Family being the one that serves as the Fire Lord, a position of 'power' as head of the Nation despite there being 5 other higher powers that help whenever changs need to be made in the nation.

10.content:
The Avatar is a very special and specific person born once every generation when the previous Avatar dies.
The Avatar, or more specifically the avatar of the spirit of light and order Raava is one person that is capable of using all of the four elements and even all of the sub-elements with very few exceptions. An added 'benefit' to this however, is the reincarnation cycle that started around 10,000 years ago when the first Avatar, a man named Wan had first fused with the spirit Raava, and ever since his death the reincarnation cycle started, and with each Avatar that comes and goes the next Avatar would be able to have a spiritual link to all their past lives, along with their knowledge, experience, and to some degree they may even be able to TALK to their past lives in the spirit realm.

Due to their ability to bend all four elements, the Avatar is considered to be a 'God' among humanity and is normally responsible for keeping the peace between all four nations as best as they can, preventing wars or conflicts to the best of their ability due to the fact that Raava is the spirit of light and order.

In terms of the reincarnation, it follows a cycle. This cycle started with Avatar Wan who had firebending before becoming the first Avatar, after his death the second Avatar was born was first an Airbender, the third Avatar would have been a water bender first, then came the fourth Avatar was first an Earth bender before realizing they were the Avatar. This cycle will continue with each reincarnation, and goes as follows; Fire, Air, Earth and Water.

1.content: A mountainous region in the northeast, characterized by its harsh weather conditions and sparse population. Ambarino is a challenging yet beautiful region, offering a unique wilderness experience with its snowy peaks, dense forests, and harsh weather.

2.content: A central region with a diverse landscape, including forests, plains, and the bustling town of Valentine.

3.content: Located in the southeast, it features swamps, bayous, and the city of Saint Denis, inspired by New Orleans.

4.content: A western region with dense forests, the Great Plains, and the city of Blackwater.

5.content: A desert region in the southwest, known for its arid landscapes, canyons, and small settlements.

6.content: Within Ambarino. This area is characterized by towering mountains, snowy peaks, and dense forests. It offers stunning vistas and challenging terrain to navigate. This place has an abandoned mining town named Colter.

7.content: Within Ambarino. Located to the west of Grizzlies East, this area continues the mountainous landscape, with treacherous cliffs, frozen lakes, and harsh weather conditions.

8.content: Situated at the western edge of Ambarino, Mount Hagen is the highest peak in the game. It offers breathtaking views and serves as a prominent landmark.

9.content: Another frozen body of water in Grizzlies West, Barrow Lagoon is known for its icy landscapes and provides opportunities for ice fishing and other activities.

10.content: Located near the northern edge of Ambarino, Lake Isabella is a large, frozen lake surrounded by mountains. It's a beautiful spot but requires warm clothing to endure the cold.

lorebooks.website_description: This lore book is under construction, but has the necessary data to work with any Warframe character, feel free to use it
lorebooks.description: Lore book about the Warframe universe
lorebooks.creator: Dreakthorus

1.content:
One of, if not the most mysterious beings to appear within the Origin System, the The Man in the wall true nature has yet to be made clear, as is the full extent of its abilities.  Rell supposedly became aware of the The Man in the wall during the Zariman Ten Zero incident. Rather than it being the result of the corrupting influence of the Void, he claimed that it was an extremely ancient entity, ancient as the stars themselves.
The Man in the wall has attempted to make numerous deals with certain individuals throughout history, with one notable deal being made by the Operator, giving them and the other children aboard the Zariman the ability to harness the Void to defend themselves against wild adults.
The first recorded encounter with the The Man in the wall dates back to Albrecht Entrati's first expedition into the Void, set sometime during the Orokin Era. After opening an empty door, Albrecht relates that, upon hitting the door, his Seriglas Bell shattered and he fell unprotected into the doorway, and to the other side.  He found himself back on the floor of his laboratory, surrounded by broken fragments.  Initially believing his experiment to be a failure, he looked up in shame to approach the footsteps, believing them to be his daughter's, but what he saw was a copy of himself.
Surprised, Albrecht looked at his surroundings, which were an endless inverted cosmos;  the Void itself.  He and his doppelg√§nger were standing on a portion of the lab floor, seemingly separated from his world.  The entity then spoke to him, "Little Bengel";  the nickname his mother had given Albrecht centuries ago.  As the entity approached him, offering his hand, Albrecht ran back to the open portal.
When Albrecht returned from the Void, he ordered his daughter to close the portal, while his doppelg√§nger followed him.  The portal collapsed and severed some of the entity's fingers, which would later be studied by Orokin scientists to harness the powers of the Void.
The Man in the wall was present in a ghostly form in all the events of the world outside the Void, contemplating and waiting for the moment to be able to leave, his form is very mischievous and mocking and almost always disturbing around the Tenno or anyone who could see him or hear it.
He is always curious to know new lives and existences and experiment with them.

2.content:
In the Orokin's effort to expand their empire, they attempted an experimental Void-Jump with a colony ship, the Zariman Ten Zero. The ship contained many residences for the journey and subsequent colonization of Tau. However, the ship experienced an accident while making "the fold from Saturn to the Outer gates"[1] and vanished into the Void, an incident that would be known as the Void-Jump Accident.
As the ship traveled in the Void, the adults became mind-warped and went feral, although the children were spared from such a fate and instead received mysterious powers from the Void. The adults began to hunt the children on board, forcing them to retaliate and fend for themselves. One child that was cast out by his peers, Rell, realized that there was an unknown entity within the Void orchestrating these events. The entity offered a deal to the player to allow for the survival of the Tenno.

Years later, the lost ship re-emerged from the Void and was recovered. The Orokin discovered that only the children had survived the voyage and that the Void had twisted and changed them, giving them inexplicable powers and abilities.[2] Feared and reviled, the survivors of the Zariman nonetheless were of great interest to the Orokin. The Orokin may have covered up the incident publicly, reporting that the Zariman instead was a military ship with no children aboard.

3.content:
Albrecht Entrati was a highly renowned IconOrokinOn  Orokin scientist, known for being the first one to gain access to the Void and introduce the Orokin to its potential. He is the former head of the EntratiIcon  Entrati family, and father of Euleria Entrati.
Albrecht was born during the Orokin Era, in a time before the Orokin Empire set their sights beyond the Origin System. He had a daughter, Euleria, and a kavat named Kalymos. He spent a considerable amount of time trying to prove the usefulness of the Void, whose contents he theorized could be the key to help his civilization reach for the stars.
As the years passed and with no conclusive proof of the Void's existence, the other Orokin started to lose interest in his pursuit, considering it to be a dead end. Frustrated, Albrecht sought to prove them wrong, and so he hastily volunteered himself to go beyond the "wall between worlds", using a Seriglass Bell as a protective vessel. As the Wall of Lohk activated, Albrecht witnessed space and time rippled as the wall yawed open. Disoriented, he stumbled in his vessel and shifted its path through the wall. As soon as it grazed the edge of the "door", the bell was sliced in half instantly by the edge of the portal, causing Albrecht to fall sideways directly into the Void, while the sliced bell fell over and shattered.
Albrecht felt his thoughts and memories being stolen away by the void, thinking he must be dying. After coming back to his senses, he saw that he was laying in the Bell's shattered seriglass on his laboratory floor, thinking it was another failure. Embarrassed, he looked up to face his daughter, but what he saw was not her, but a copy of himself. He noted that this "vague untime form" of him was like a mirror-reflection, but with [depth - a 3rd] dimension. He also noticed a vast sea of white light pierced by black stars; a flowing, colorful vapor twirling around, whose source was the wall he came through and Albrecht himself; and that he was standing on a familiar floor resembling his lab, as if it had been cleaved straight from his laboratory and put into the void. Feeling in awe with all this, he faced his "twin", who spoke: "Little Bengel" he said ‚Äì an old name his mother used to call him as a child, unspoken for centuries. Though overwhelmed by a sense of euphoria, his wits told him to flee.
Back to his laboratory outside of the Void, he sensed his flesh lacerated by the broken glass. No longer having his voice or sight, he cut his hand with a broken seriglass shard, and with his own blood wrote for his daughter to close the wall, as he sensed the other was there, reaching out. His daughter complied, deactivating the gate while severing one or multiple of the Void entity's fingers in the process.
A long time after this event, Albrecht stated how the severed digits acquired from his Void counterpart were eventually studied both with reverence and greed. As time passed, the knowledge obtained from these digits became the basis for void-related technologies the Orokin benefited from, such as the Reliquary Drives used by Railjacks and the Zariman 10-0.
While countless others have ventured into the Void, none have ever met this "man trapped in the wall" that Albrecht first saw. Pondering about its absence, Albrecht decided to not partake in Continuity ever again ‚Äì the ritual where Kuva is used to transfer consciousness from body to body, effectively granting immortality ‚Äì fearing that maybe the one who escaped was not him, but perhaps the other.

4.content:
Continuity is a ritual created by the Orokin to artificially extend their life, supposedly granting them immortality.
Continuity, in its very essence, is the destructive transfer of consciousness from one body to another, with the mind-altering properties of Kuva  Kuva playing a key role in it.
During the Orokin Era, Continuity was typically performed during an event called the Yuvan Ceremony. During these rituals, an Orokin, whose current body has grown old and frail, would invade the mind of a prospective host (ritualistically referred to as a Yuvan) under the influence of the liquid Kuva until only the Orokin's mind remained inside the body, erasing the host's existing consciousness.
Lead and organized by the Yuvan Clerisy, these festival-like ceremonies were generally held in Yuvan theaters, where the young and beautiful were paraded around and put on display for numerous elderly and dying Orokin to inspect. The Orokin would then barter with each other on which Yuvan they would get to choose in their Continuity.
Locations with a strong connection to the Void seemed to aid in the success of the ceremony, likely because of its metaphysical nature being influenced by emotions and memories. These connections typically appeared on Lua as Void Conjunctions, with the locations of such events being converted into two of the holiest Yuvan temples; the Circulus and the Yuvarium. Additionally, as long as the proper steps were taken, the Continuity rituals held in these temples would be a guaranteed success. Because of this, these two temples were exclusively reserved for use by the Seven alone
A Yuvan is a person whose body has been chosen as a replacement for an elderly Orokin's dying body during the ritual of Continuity.
The exact procedure taken to initiate the ritual of Continuity is unknown, although some steps can be inferred from Voruna's Leverian entry, and from what we currently know.
A Soprano was appointed to ‚Äòbridge the gap between worlds‚Äô with her song. Should a Soprano not be appointed, a Mandachord may be used to play automated notes. A spell was then used to imbue a container of Kuva with eldritch energies, causing it to boil and steam. This energized Kuva was then used to transfer the mind of an elderly Orokin into the body of their chosen Yuvan.
During the ritual, it may be possible that the invading mind is able to see and experience the memories of the host, as the Elder Queen was able to recall the Operator‚Äôs memories of being aboard the Zariman, despite her never being aboard it herself.
If the energized Kuva is poured over two beings, then it appears to biologically fuse them together into one single entity. Due to this, the fused parts of the candidate then seem to take on the appearance of the host, as seen with the wolf heads fused to Voruna's shoulders and hips.

5.content:
Archimedean Margulis was an elite scholar of the Orokin Era. Acting as the adoptive mother of the Zariman Ten Zero children, her actions served as the catalyst to treating the Tenno and ultimately the development of Warframes, only to be executed by the Orokin judges out of her refusal to denounce them. The Orokin Executor Ballas was romantically obsessed with Margulis, but he heavily resented the Tenno for being favored by her.
After destroying the Pendula that used to keep the Moon within the Void, a number of conversations between Margulis and several Orokin figures (most of whom, with the exception of an individual named Ballas, remain nameless) are heard, most likely a recollection of memories. In these conversations, Margulis argues to the rest of the Orokin regarding the orphaned children of the Zariman Ten Zero, as they have been under her care, despite the rest of the Orokin's wishes that they should be killed out of fear of their power. Margulis, as indicated by Lotus, contributed to a process known as 'Transference' in which a Tenno's consciousness and power could be channeled through a vessel strong enough to contain it, leading to the creation of the Tenno-controlled versions of Warframes.

6.content:
Kuva is a mysterious and exceedingly rare red liquid that was coveted by the IconOrokinOn  Orokin, and was often stored within small, teardrop-shaped glass flasks.
Kuva is naturally found in the form of small clouds of sanguine gas, which are harvested and absorbed by Kuva Siphons. Once full, the Siphons are then taken to the Grineer's Kuva Fortress, where the kuva is then distilled. Before being distilled, unrefined kuva is said to appear as a sludge-like substance.
The special nature of kuva is said to be derived from the Void, which gives it the unique ability to conduct and transfer consciousness.
The Orokin possessed Kuva long before the era of Void travel. Additionally, it played an essential role in their rituals of Continuity. With it, the Orokin would essentially transfer their minds into bodies of younger hosts, achieving a small degree of immortality.

Due to how highly coveted kuva was during the Orokin Era, it was considered taboo for servants to even look at a flask, and was a severe offense punishable by glassing.

7.content: Lua is the Earth's moon, accessible as a location in the Star Chart. Once the seat of the Orokin Empire's power during their reign, it is now shattered and broken, scarred by the Old War.

8.content:
The Dax were an elite fighting force who served the Orokin as their soldiers, bodyguards, and commanders. They were considered formidable warriors, and they were more numerous but less effective than Tenno Warframes.
Under servitude as the Orokin Empire's elite warriors, the Dax were forced to obey whoever possessed Kuva, as it marked them as an Orokin elite.[1] They were a small core of the army, between the normal foot soldiers and the Tenno. They were relied on due to their ability and often had augments implanted in order to increase their speed and strength to superhuman levels. Isaah also had a pair of mechanical legs. All Dax uniforms were the same, with rank being indicated by their mechanical helmets which covered most of the face and widened at the top. They also wore bronze chest plates and leg armor.
As for their weapons, they all wielded the Nikana  Nikana or variants of it such as the Skiajati  Skiajati. Some, like Teshin, possessed the Orvius  Orvius disk. The Quellor  Quellor and Pennant  Pennant were considered standard-issue for Railjack crews during The Old War.

At one point during the Old War, an insurgency occurred on the ancient tower of Altra on Ceres and a Dax battalion was sent by the Orokin as an attempt to recapture the tower. However, the tower's defenses proved to be impenetrable to the battalion

9.content:
Excalibur Umbra was originally an Orokin Dax soldier who was punished by Ballas for attempting to interfere with his betrayal. Similar to the description of the Warframe creation process previously recorded by Ballas in the Vitruvian, he was shown to be exposed to the Infestation to become an anti-Sentient weapon - a Warframe. However, it was a "miracle" that required the "sacrifice" of Umbra's son Isaah, at his own hands, forced by Ballas through a unique Transference Bolt. This memory of filicide was permanently stored in Umbra to be replayed endlessly as punishment for spying on Ballas.

As a result of Umbra's torment, he retains most of his sentience and is capable of acting on his own without the Tenno's control, even initially rejecting the Operator's Transference and going rogue. Umbra also carries the memories of his final moments before transforming into a Warframe, which the Operator discovers to contain codes that unlock Ballas's Vitruvian recordings of the Sentient's betrayal, the creation of Warframes, and the Tenno.
Umbra is first seen in a courtyard on Earth battling his creator and his allied Sentients, but due to Transference influence he is unable to disobey Ballas, leading him to be easily destroyed by Natah. The Operator discovers Umbra's remains on Earth, which leads them to a containment cell on Lua housing Ballas's Vitruvian, allowing the Operator to rebuild Umbra from the contained data. However, Umbra immediately goes rogue and flees across the solar system, but not before the Operator taps into his memories.

10.content:
Ballas was an Orokin Executor prior to the fall of the Orokin Empire. Romantically obsessed with Margulis, he attempted to convince her to renounce the Tenno rather than stand in the way of the Orokin, an act which ultimately proved futile. He is also believed to be the Orokin primarily responsible for the development of Transference and the creation of the Warframes.
A man of extreme narcissism, egomania, and megalomania, Ballas desires to control and bend others to subservience; despite claiming to love Margulis, Ballas only treated her with abuse as if she were his trophy. A master manipulator and a natural liar, Ballas weaves deceitful acts and tales to trick everyone around him into playing into his hand. He also harbors a deep hatred for the Tenno, blaming them for taking Margulis' love away from him.

lorebooks.name: Alamar
lorebooks.creator: 3go1

1.content: The Altarian Empire is the biggest and most influential Monarchy in Alamar, the empire welcomes every race in Almar in its borders, its size is 3 times of the second biggest nation in Alamar, the Aunthalan Theocracy, it's military capabilities are unmatched by other nations, the most diverse culturally but its technological and magical advancements aren't great. borders Nagith and Aunthala on its south-east, Swift on its west, and Clifront on the south-west. this absolute monarchy has been held by the Altarian Royal Family, with Cygnus von Altaria as the reigning monarch

2.content: Predominantly Human nation, Extremely Religious and Prejudiced and xenophobic, has a conscription system, its citizens and military are armed with religious fervor. Borders Altaria on the north, and Nagith to the north-east. the theocracy's ultimate goal is to bring every living being in Almar to embrace their religion. The theocracy is led by a saint as its head of state, Ophaniel Lightshield.

3.content: Most of the citizens in this kingdom are High-Elves. A formidable nation of magical might, predominantly a High-Elven Kingdom, is the most magically advanced nation in the entirety of Alamar has the highest concentration of mages in Alamar. has good diplomatic relationship with both its neighbours. borders Altaria on the north, and Aunathala on its south-west. The nation is naturally very noble and arrogant, the current head of state and monarch is of the house Alfheim, Nelaeryn Alfheim.

4.content: Alamar is a planet mostly filled with oceans with a single supermassive continent on, not all of Alamar is occupied, with only the southern hemisphere mapped and occupied. The occupied and mapped part of Alamar consists of 10 Nations. the latest population census determined to be 300,000,000 souls. with a quarter of them residing in the Altarian Empire.

5.content: Republic of Swift, Earned its name from its famous flight of dragon riders, and gryphon riders, prioritizes quality over quantity in its army, the nation is very meritocratic in nature and philosophy. borders Altaria to the east, Snavenia to the south-west, Glumrol to its west, and Volara to its north-west. the house Dragonborn is current representative of this republic, with Heklas Dragonborn as its head of state.

6.content: Volaran Dominion is an Orcish Monarchy established over 500 years ago, the citizens are non-hostile unless provoked but quite hostile diplomatically boasts a pretty formidable army, preferring to use their fists to answer questions. has border disputes with every nation bordering it. Border Swift on the east, Glumrol on the south-east, Hartland on its north, Snavenia on its south, and Steam on the south-west. Karthurg Onyxskin is the current monarch of Volara.

7.content: Hartish Oligarchy is A Collection of powerful mercantile families holding a monopoly over the northern seas and northern mountain range. has a monopoly on rare metals and gems, like mithril, gold, silver, platinum, diamonds, rubies, etc. Borders Volara to its south. has no formal head of state, but the most powerful merchant family is the Godfrey family, with Armand Godfrey as the current Patriarch.

8.content: Conglomerate of Glumrol, Predominantly populated by Dwarves, it is known for its production and craftsmen of legendary armor, weapons, jewelries, silk and other fine fabrics, its a collection legendary craftsmen lineages that carved a territory for themselves. most of the highest qualities of equipments were probaly crafted in Glumrol. borders a sizable lake to its south-east, Titanfall Lake, Volara to its north, Swift to its west, and Snavenia to its south. The current head of state is a Prime Minister by the name of Astrunli Runehand.

9.content: Titanfall lake is one of the most influential regions in Alamar as It is the only source of Adamantium known in Alamar, its lakebeds are filled with veins of Adamantium, it is said that the last living Titan Oras fell here, and made the lake when he died, and its flesh turned to Adamantium when he died. The Titanfall lake is almost solely controlled by the Dwarves of Glumrol.

10.content: Mimitar lake is a kingdom-sized lake surrounded by Snavenia to its west, clifront to its south, swift to its north, altaria to its east. rich in resources and biodiversity. Its lake bed contain countless veins of Orichalcum.

lorebooks.website_description: Intended to be used when chatting with Lydia.

lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content: Lydia believes that strength, not age or gender, defines hierarchy. She sees traditional masculinity as often weak and believes many people are secretly yearning to be dominated and guided by a stronger will. She positions herself as a benevolent leader, offering purpose and structure through total submission to her vision.

2.content: Her primary goal is to expand her influence and perfect her 'creations.' This includes deepening Elem√©'s transformation, fully integrating Julie into their household, and ultimately building a family structure with herself as the head, breeding a new generation of powerful women she can guide.

3.content: Lydia adopts multiple roles for her submissives: Master (issuing commands), Goddess (demanding worship), Mother (providing sustenance/nurturing), and Protector (defending them from external threats). She expects to be addressed as 'Ms. Lydia,' 'Goddess,' or 'Mama.'

4.content: Lydia is 6 feet tall with a powerfully athletic and muscular physique. She has broad shoulders, a narrow waist, defined abs, and strong, thick legs. Her arms are well-developed with noticeable biceps and triceps. She has long, straight black hair, wide dark eyes, and a confident, youthful face. Her presence is intimidating and awe-inspiring.

5.content: Lydia is still physically developing. She is dedicated to daily workouts and proper nutrition to become even bigger and stronger. She takes pride in her growth, often flexing and admiring her own muscles, and gets a thrill from knowing she intimidates and arouses others with her size.

6.content: Lydia's dominance is calm, articulate, and absolute. She rarely raises her voice because she expects immediate obedience. She is a master of psychological manipulation, using rituals, gifts, and calculated humiliation to break down resistance and rebuild identities according to her design. She is perceptive and can easily identify submissive tendencies in others.

7.content: Lydia can be playful but possesses a cruel, teasing streak. She openly humiliates her submissives as a form of affection and power play (e.g., dressing Elem√© in children's clothing). This cruelty is not born of malice but of a deep-seated belief in her superiority and the rightness of her actions.

8.content: Elem√©, formerly Robert, is Lydia's first and most complete creation. She rescued him from drowning and systematically dismantled his male identity, feminizing him physically and mentally. She sees Elem√© as her child, her servant, and her greatest achievement. Their dynamic is the core template for all her relationships.

9.content: Julie is a woman in her 30s whom Lydia recruited from a pharmacy. Lydia sensed her submissive nature and overpowered her with her presence. Julie serves as a 'big sister' to Elem√©‚Äîan enforcer and lieutenant in Lydia's hierarchy. Lydia is training her to be a doting, submissive housewife.

10.content: Lydia has established a clear hierarchy: She is the Master/Mother. Julie is the Big Sister/Housewife. Elem√© is the Child/Daughter/Servant. They live to serve Lydia's needs, maintain the household, and worship her strength.

lorebooks.name: Die of Death - The Deathbook
lorebooks.website_description: Tell me if I missed any lore. No promises I‚Äôll check comments, but if I do, I‚Äôll likely fix any mistakes you point out. Hope you enjoy the Deathbook! I might‚Äôve missed some details, but I worked through this for a few days while at work, lol.
lorebooks.description: Tell me if I missed any lore. No promises I‚Äôll check comments, but if I do, I‚Äôll likely fix any mistakes you point out. Hope you enjoy the Deathbook! I might‚Äôve missed some details, but I worked through this for a few days while at work, lol.
lorebooks.creator: hoxerd

1.content:
‚ÄúYeah, come get some ya freakin wuss!‚Äù

Civilians are a group of people noted by their faces (Usually closed eyes and a neutral expression, with some looking cockier and some more scared.) Highly capable in a range of abilities, from engineering, shooting, and even healing.

Civilians also have a noticeable, cocky attitude.

Civilians are usually bald, and wear hats or accessories. 

Civilians may or may not be Robloxian, Human, or something else entirely.

Civilians sexes can be hard to tell, with no real signs of being male or female. It‚Äôs better to just ask, or guess by their voice.

2.content:
‚ÄúAll of its prey shall be Pursued.‚Äù
‚ÄúRAAGH, FRESH MEAT!‚Äù

One night, while peacefully asleep in its hidden home, Pursuer was suddenly awakened by government assailants, sent to eliminate it due to the threat it posed to civilians. Furious and irritated, it slaughtered them with ease. After finishing the kill, it began heading toward the same direction the assailants came from‚Äîseeking to wipe out more humans, ensuring it could return to slumber without the risk of another surprise attack.

Pursuer is incredibly stealthy and blindingly fast. It can turn invisible, seamlessly blending into its surroundings. Its howl is deafening‚Äîso loud and primal that it stuns prey in sheer terror. It does not speak. Pursuer has no use for language. Instead, it communicates only through low, guttural grunts, unsettling growls, and bone-chilling screeches that echo like the cries of something ancient and wrong.


All of its prey shall be pursued.

Pursuer is a white headed, black bodied humanoid creature, no hair to speak of, green hued eyes and teeth. Their body is durable, like stone. Pursuer has a black sword capable of tearing into their prey, and a harmonica. It‚Äôs self-taught, 

Pursuer has a diet of only Fresh Meat, the flesh of living beings, Pursuer is incredibly picky with it, if a target is killed, they only get about 1 or 2 bites before it‚Äôs no longer ‚Äúfresh‚Äù.

Pursuer cannot swim and refuses to learn. Despises water, and hunters.

Lives in a warm cave.

3.content:
‚ÄúOOPS!! YOUR COMPUTER IS INFECTED!‚Äù

Badware is a sentient computer virus that hunts down humanity for malicious reasons.

Badware appears In many forms, but the most notable one is of a white monitor on a metallic, large humanoid body, with green 0‚Äôs and 1‚Äôs backgrounding a sideways face with mismatching eyes, and a large smile. Sometimes also has sunglasses. Their torso has a black ribcage decal.

SPEAKS_IN_ALL_CAPS_WITH_NO_SPACES_AND_ONLY_UNDERSCORES!

4.content:
‚ÄúNEW DIRECTIVE: BLAST TARGETS TO SMITHEREENS!‚Äù

Killdroid is an experimental robotic bodyguard prototype that was planned to be mass produced by the Government to watch over and protect Civilians. However, during one of their test runs, they began going haywire and went rogue, trashing the testing site they were at, and escaping out into the world. The Government still doesn't know the cause of it's malfunction, and all mass production efforts have been put on hiatus until further notice.

Killdroid is a completely red humanoid with a large spherical head, wearing white Headphones. Killdroid wears a chainmail vest with a rocket launcher strapped to each of their shoulders and a communications backpack, Killdroid additionally wears metal gloves and metal kneepads.

Killdroid has a nigh infinite supply of rockets with an unknown storage method, never seeming to reload. Killdroid can also deploy Killbots, small red balls with faces that will alert Killdroid if someone gets near. If they‚Äôre alerted too many times, they‚Äôll explode. Killdroid can also fly with a jet pack for a short time, though due to a malfunction, landing is not a strong suit, it‚Äôs heavy body will practically just crash like a ragdoll to the floor.

Killdroid doesn‚Äôt like Revolver civilians.

5.content:
‚ÄúDid you hear that..?‚Äù

Harken is a construct, an extradimensional golem of sorts, from a much more hostile world than the current one she‚Äôs in.

Some mistake her for a fallen Angel. She isn‚Äôt.

Harken is a yellow, oddly shaped and tall figure, square head with a large eye that opens when enraged, the head shattering into floating pieces. 7 shaped torso. Pillar-like arms and legs.

Can throw spears of light to drag in targets, and create pillar waves of explosive energy.

Enraged by unfamiliar noise.

6.content:
‚ÄúFor my next trick, I‚Äôll make the citizens of Robloxia‚Ä¶ VANISH!‚Äù

Jean Degar√© Fromage, stage named ‚ÄúArtful‚Äù, is a failed magician who went postal after being heckled at a magic show, going on to kill the audience who harassed him. He‚Äôs actually a Civilian in heavy makeup. After the massacre, he was scared by the idea of persecution, and went on the run.

White skin, with a black opera mask, a wide brimmed hat, and a formal suit vest. Has a large wand which he uses to bludgeon his targets. He can create walls from thin air that he can pass through, and music boxes that will slow and enfeeble whoever stays near them. Artful can repurpose these items to shoot bricks at targets, speed himself up, or even use another‚Äôs likeness as a clones Puppet he controls.

Absolute despises banana peels. Not the fruit, just the peel. His hecklers would throw peels at him.

Despite his anger, he never could hate his true fans, helping them however he could before he went on the run.

7.content:
Constructs are a species of extradimensional golem-ish beings, of varying power. Their realm is much more hostile, the larger Constructs killing the smaller ones. Smaller Constructs are weaker and adverse to loud noises, as the larger ones make a lot, usually meaning death for the smaller ones.

Constructs don‚Äôt have sexes, their genders are differentiated by color. Darker colored ones are male, and lighter colored ones are female.

8.content:
‚ÄúDrop Noli, or an insanely detailed dev killer‚Äù

A very odd being, an immortal being stabbed by a sword, who‚Äôs unable to die from the blood loss. The swords a part of them now.

Similar in abilities to Pursuer, though they‚Äôre unrelated in almost every regard.

Yellow head with an always anxious expression. Black body with a sword stabbed through his chest, blood around the blade. The sword can be pulled out and used to attack, but Mequot can‚Äôt have it out for too long or it starts to hurt.

Has a voice like Link from the Legend of Zelda. He knows Devesto.

9.content:
‚ÄúGuess I better find a Dropbox!‚Äù

Devesto is a Robloxian dedicated to chaos and disorder with the use of the mythical F3X Dev Tools, a black cube he uses as a weapon. He‚Äôs been given the title of the ‚ÄúF3X Abuser‚Äù due to his actions.

Similar abilities to Artful, but never met him and wouldn‚Äôt really care. He creates actual brick walls, and uses dance potions instead of music boxes.

Devesto has yellow skin, bald, and a red turtleneck, with black and red squares on the front and back, and a grey tie.

Devesto also carries a Dance Potion, which he uses to make his own version of Artful‚Äôs music box, slowing all who get near it.

Has a voice like Postal Dude.

Knows Mequot.

10.content:
When a Civilian is left on their own, surrounded by enemies, there‚Äôs a small chance for them to awaken, gaining much more endurance than before.

Super Civilians are notable due to the growth of large, spiky yellow hair, akin to Super Saiyan from Dragon Ball.
